title: BG Monitor Diabetes
description:
*** Healthline's Best Diabetes App of 2018! ***

BG Monitor is a new diabetes tool, made for how you want to manage your diabetes. Blood glucose trends are identified to notify you of needed adjustments - saving you from staring at your logbook. Insulin is automatically calculated when you enter your blood glucose and food so that you can quickly get back to what matters most.

Finally, a diabetes app that's as smart as you.

TRACK EVERYTHING
Record your blood glucose, food, insulin, exercise, and more. Tag your entries to find them faster or take a picture of your meal to remember exactly what you ate.

SMART ANALYSIS
Gain insight into your numbers, without the work. Automatically identifies trends and notifies you if adjustments are needed.

DETAILED STATISTICS
Track your progress with comprehensive statistics and graphs. Filter your data and search by date to find exactly what you're looking for.

SEND REPORTS IN SECONDS
Don't waste time creating a spreadsheet. Instantly share reports of how you're doing with your doctor and loved ones.

BUILT FOR YOU
Dial in your targets and ratios to automatically calculate insulin for each meal. Supports both U.S. and international units of measurement (mg/dL and mmol/L).

GET THINGS DONE
Designed for speed so you can get back to what matters most. Create entries right from your home screen or record blood glucose directly from reminders.

Need help?
Visit https://www.bg-monitor.com/

Know another language?
Help translate at https://gowong.oneskyapp.com/collaboration/project?id=47648

comments: Great tool for diabetics, helps to keep all blood logs in one place. Also the auto counting feature for insulin and carbs is a great. One of the top apps out there. Update 2020: Found a major flaw with the app, when trying to export logs there is no option to add to email as a PDF ect. Also when exporting to google drive for example the data is discombobulated and unusable. Hopefully this gets fixed soon because without an exporting function the app becomes useless, which is a shame.

This app for recording BS, food intake, and insulin works great for me. Get the paid upgrade. It is well worth the money just for library of food carbs. The only thing I would like to see added is a simple operator"s manual. The 'Help Section' is useful, but could be expanded.

Jesus christ. This app auto selects part of your insulin and aims. If I took what this app suggests I would be dead! Not even close to being correct. A time when I can manually work out I need 18 units this all is telling me to take 32 units... uninstalled quickly.
The app is easy to use . Helps me see the ups and downs and I like that it figures out the amount of insulin I need.

Excellent app , has saved my son's fingers as it does what the expert meter used to do, but with this app I can just input his bg from his cgm without having to always finger prick. Thks for this app!

title: Diacomp (diabetes diary)
description:
Diacomp is e-diary for diabetes type I patients. The app allows tracking personal data (including blood level measurements, insulin dosage and meal content). The way it differs from another e-diaries is automatic patient analyzing, building adaptive model of carbohydrate processes, which is useful for calculating insulin dosages and balancing meals.

[New] Nice charts help you to track your health progress

title: Diabetes App - myDiabeticAlert
description:
Our diabetes app automatically provides you research-based meal and activity plans that take all the decision-making out of the process to help you control your disease.

-DIET & NUTRITION - MEAL PLANNER
No food entry, no counting calories. The meal planner AUTOMATICALLY delivers weekly balance menus that meet nutritional rules for diabetes.
Daily menus offer a deal of nutrients adapted to diabetes: from the total daily calories, Carbohydrates represent 45-55 %, Fats up to 30 % and the Proteins around 15 %.
The recipes are elaborated with food products recommended for diabetes, with reduced saturated fat, low in cholesterol and NO sugar.

-ACTIVITY TRACKING
You can select your tracking device and link it effortlessly with myDiabeticAlert mobile app, to measure the amount of calories consumed per day.
You'll be able to track your progress and see how your physical activity and weight reduction affect your blood pressure and weight.
The collected data is consolidated and integrated with the weight control management to deliver your personal meal plan to make you reach your weight target.

-GLUCOSE METER
The app allows to add manually the glucose levels, making it compatible with any glucose meter in the 
market.

-MEDICATION
Control your daily insulin and medication intake.
You could select and add types of insulin and other medications you regularly take, and enter the amount and the time of the day you taking them like before or after every meal.
Medications and taking times will be store in your history that could be share with your Caregiver or doctor.

-REMINDERS (Configurable on desktop app)
How personal for a patient to hear from someone they love that it is time to take their medication, recorded in that person’s own voice. This feature enhances the caring for the patient with mild cognitive impairment or anxiety.
Set reminders to take medication, keep appointments etc; automate the process of reminding patients to keep to their medical schedules. This creates a sense of independence for the patient, and well-being to their loved ones.
Scheduled reminders delivery times will be sent to the patient’s Smartphone as a voice and written message

-DATA-SHARING
Caregivers and healthcare providers are often the front line of defense against disease in the child, elderly and chronically ill patient.
Sharing medical data with these people not only gives them comfort, but allows them to care for the patient remotely when they cannot be right by their side, increasing the consistency that they are able to help a patient monitor their vital functions.
Sharing aggregated medical data (glucose, blood pressure, weight, activity tracking, etc.) provides a more accurate record of health and creates better treatment options for the patient in managing their disease.

-ALERTS
Some Patients require action to be taken in real-time. The app “Alerts Settings” lets you set individual measurements thresholds and non-engagement alerts which will be delivered to you and your caregiver.
Medical alerts. When a measurement value is out of thresholds configured.
Non-engagement alerts. When a measurement from the Patient is NOT registered in the platform within the time scheduled.

title: PredictBGL for Diabetic Pets
description:
PredictBGL for Pets helps care for your diabetic pet. 

-- Digital Health helping man's best friend! --

The app 
  1) records symptoms, blood glucose values, weight and meals leftovers 
  2) provides predictive curves for Blood Glucose, helping you to get your pet's insulin doses right faster and safer
  3) provides meal time reminders, hypo warning reminders and hypo retest reminders
  4) records weight and actual food intake 
  5) can send full reports to your vet by email.

Treatment of diabetes includes daily insulin injections and a special diet, both given at precise times of the day.
PredictBGL for Pets allows you to specify meal times and meal amounts to make tracking easier.

Home monitoring:

Veterinarians ask owners to measure blood glucose, weight changes, and note symptoms or abnormal feeding behaviors. PredictBGL for pets helps owners record this information and email it to their cat or dog’s vet.

Records symptoms
- Select and record the symptoms your pet has experienced during the day. They are presented as 'feelings' that distinguishes between hypoglycemic (low blood sugar) and hyperglycemic (high blood sugar) symptoms
- Receive a special warning for hypoglycemic symptoms

Produces the Blood Glucose Curve
The vet may ask the owner to perform a Blood Glucose Curve on a regular basis. PredictBGL for pets shows you the blood glucose curve, and you can easily see if the expected blood sugars are above or below it. The results can be sent to the vet for interpretation to adapt the insulin dose and type. Or, save money and time by doing this yourself!
- Choose blood glucose unit: mg/dL (range 0-500), mmol/L (range 0-30)
- Record data (times of the blood samples & blood glucose values). 
- Watch the predicted Blood Glucose Curve on the Dashboard in real time

Records actual food consumption 
- Estimate and record the amount of food leftovers of each meal 
- Watch the actual food intake curve on the Dashboard

Helps contact the attending veterinarian
- Call your vet or send him/her an email with the app
- Upon request, send to your vet a report of all monitoring information

We're always working to make PredictBGL for Pets better! Have a problem, criticism, question, suggestion, or praise? It’s all super important to us, and we'd love to hear from you.
Reach out to us at:

• predictbgl.com
• support@managebgl.com?subject=Pets
• twitter.com/predictbgl
• facebook.com/predictbgl

PredictBGL for pets shows you the blood glucose curve, and you can easily see if the expected blood sugars are above or below it. The results can be sent to the vet for interpretation to adapt the insulin dose and type. Or, save money and time by doing this yourself!
- Choose blood glucose unit: mg/dL (range 0-500), mmol/L (range 0-30)
- Record data (times of the blood samples & blood glucose values).
- Watch the predicted Blood Glucose Curve on the Dashboard in real time

Records actual food consumption
- Estimate and record the amount of food leftovers of each meal
- Watch the actual food intake curve on the Dashboard

Helps contact the attending veterinarian
- Call your vet or send him/her an email with the app
- Upon request, send to your vet a report of all monitoring information

We're always working to make PredictBGL for Pets better! Have a problem, criticism, question, suggestion, or praise? It’s all super important to us, and we'd love to hear from you.
Reach out to us at:

• predictbgl.com
• support@managebgl.com?subject=Pets
• twitter.com/predictbgl
• facebook.com/predictbgl

title: OneTouch Reveal® mobile app for Diabetes
description:
Try the #1 downloaded diabetes app worldwide in 2019!* The OneTouch Reveal® mobile app has helped over one million people with type 1, type 2 and gestational Diabetes take a step forward in their diabetes management.*
The OneTouch Reveal® mobile app works seamlessly with the OneTouch Verio Reflect® meter and OneTouch Verio Flex® meter, using ColorSure® technology to change the way you see your blood sugar.

Helps you easily spot blood sugar patterns
• Transforms data into colorful snapshots that connect your blood sugar with food, insulin and activity.
• Draws a timeline of important blood sugar events and activities, highlighting when you have been repeatedly out of range.
• Receive automatic notifications on your smartphone when a high or low blood glucose pattern is detected.

Personalize your diabetes management tools
• Set personalized reminders to stay on top of patterns, meds, food, exercise—whatever you need to manage your diabetes.
• With the Blood Sugar Mentor™ feature, you get personalized guidance, insight, and encouragement to help you make adjustments to manage your blood sugar. (only available when using the OneTouch Verio Reflect® meter).

Set up and track personalized goals and visualize your progress over time.
• BG Tests: Test your blood sugar to identify patterns.
• Step Tracking: Monitor the number of steps you walk each day.
• Carb Tracking: Regularly log the carbohydrates you eat to see the correlation between your food intake and your blood sugar levels.
• Activity Tracking: Track the amount of exercise you are getting.

Easy-to-view diabetes logbook
• Automatically logs and organizes your blood glucose results.
• Identify high and low blood glucose results with the color-coded logbook.
• See how you’re doing at a glance, with a simple 14-, 30- and 90-day overview of your blood sugar results.

Other helpful blood glucose management features
• Share your progress with your care team between visits – you can email your personalized diabetes report.
• The A1c comparator on the OneTouch Reveal® mobile app lets you compare your lab A1c to the average of your blood sugar readings from the last 90 days.**

Questions?
Or if you’d like to know more about the OneTouch Reveal® mobile app, please call OneTouch® Customer Care at
1-866-693-0599 or visit www.OneTouch.com

*Research2Guidance Diabetes App Market Monitor Q1-Q4 2019 data.
**Must enter A1c test result provided by healthcare professional.

Compatible with devices with BTLE (Bluetooth® Low Energy) support and running Android Version 5.1, 6.0, 7.0, 7.1, 8.0, 8.1., 9.0 Depending on your Android device and version, screenshots in Help file may not match what you see in your app.

The Bluetooth® word mark and logos are registered trademarks owned by Bluetooth SIG, Inc., and any use of such marks by LifeScan Scotland Ltd. and its affiliates is under license.

recentChanges: • Improved Walgreens connectivity
comments: I have only been using this app for a few days but I love it so far. It's so easy to check my blood sugars for the day or week. It clearly highlights when they are too high and it's so confidential l convenient that you can share with a clinic. I don't have to worry about writing down my results and bringing them in for visits!

This app makes me more aware of how the food that I eat effects my blood glucose every day. I have seen better results in my A1C levels when I get checked by my doctor every three months! I recommend this app for others who may not have this valuable information to keep their health in good shape! Last A1C was 5.7 !!

Worse app and even the meter looks like a very cheap toy. I have an accu-chek that is way better but it drains battery like crazy Onetouch doesn't always synchronize and when it does it takes few tries. The replies from their reviews is a joke. Same message for everyone having difficulties. I guess some companies get a pass with terrible products like this one and end up getting big market for this garbage.

Just purchased, just starting monitoring, down loaded app and turned meter on and synced. I wasn't sure what I was doing and took couple tries but synced once I followed directions. I am using Galaxy A70. Once I start using app with readings, I will update this . Update I have been using the app for about a month. I found if I open app then minimize it, then press OK on monitor as it is booting up, tap app to open it. Both will sync. Give it a few seconds. I upgraded to 4 stars...

Using it for about 15 months. Easy to use. Clearly shows glucose trends. Companion website makes it easy to produce reports for the doctor to review. Ability to record activity and carbohydrates consumed provides the doctor additional information relating to glucose numbers.

title: CONTOUR DIABETES app (US)
description:
The new CONTOUR™DIABETES app syncs with a CONTOUR connected meter for seamless blood glucose (BG) monitoring. This easy-to-use app can give you a better understanding of how your daily activities affect your BG results to help you manage your diabetes. 

In addition to using the Contour®Diabetes App, always consult with your Health Care Professional before making any changes to your diet, exercise or treatment regimen.

Most people with diabetes know that logging blood glucose (BG) results after taking blood samples can be inconvenient and time-consuming. But now, with the new CONTOUR DIABETES app, you can easily and conveniently capture all your BG readings to help you manage your diabetes, smarter.

The CONTOUR®DIABETES app presents your BG results in a simple and easy-to-review way that’s personalized to you.

Download the CONTOUR®DIABETES app today, so you can receive meaningful information on how you are progressing, with some of the latest easy-to-use features…

•	My Patterns – helps you identify trends in your blood glucose results and notifies you of potential causes to help you understand your diabetes in a new light
•	Test Reminder Plans – let you optimize your testing regime to give you results that are more insightful
•	Record – events such as diet, activities and medication, and also add photos, notes or voice memos to help put your results in context
•	View – if you use insulin and/or log your carbs, you can now see your insulin doses, carb intakes and blood glucose results in one simple view
•	Share – give your healthcare professional greater insight with the easy-to-read diary report – send this report in advance or take it with you on the day of your appointment

Learn more about the new CONTOUR DIABETES app and CONTOUR connected meters at:
 www.contourone.com
Compatibility.contourone.com

Note: Screenshots are for illustration purposes. Availability of blood glucose meter model based on country of purchase.  Units of measurement in the app will match that of your synced meter. For more information, please refer to the user guide for your CONTOUR connected meter.

© 2018 Ascensia Diabetes Care Holdings AG. All rights reserved.

Manufacturer
Ascensia Diabetes Care Holdings AG
Peter Merian-Strasse 90
4052 Basel, Switzerland
www.contourone.com

Ascensia, the Ascensia Diabetes Care logo and Contour are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Ascensia Diabetes Care Holdings AG.

comments: After updating this morning, the Contour app refuses to open. Come on!! This is not like a gaming app. This app helps me stay healthy. Do you plan on fixing the glitch??? Edit: I called the number provided. Nothing was resolved. The app was working beautifully for several years. It stopped working October 14 at 8am when the app updated on its own. Glitch!!!! Come on programmers. Time to fix your mistakes!!!!

After the last update the app won't open. Uninstalled and reinstalled and app opens now but won't accept the email and new password. I used the password to log in to the website but it the app won't accept it. Okay I leaned that website is not connected to the app. Customer service helped me change the app password and it works great again.

It's really great that let the consumer know that test strip are still available. However, the notification keeps popping up everytime you try to navigate the app. It is very annoying. Also setting it up was very difficult.
A week ago and for the last few years this has been a 5 star app. After the last update it won't open. How about instead of asking us each individually to contact support, you just fix the app.
Normally app is great. Since the last update, the app will not open. Tried to Uninstaller and reinstall the app and still had the issue. Need a new update to fix this bug!

title: ডায়বেটিস নিয়ন্ত্রণের  A to Z-Diabetes Treatment
description:
বিসমিল্লাহির রহমানির রাহিম। আসসালামু আলাইকুম প্রিয় ভাই বোন ও বন্ধুরা। ডায়াবেটিস রোগ ও নিরাময় এবং ডায়বেটিস নিয়ন্ত্রণের উপায় নিয়ে আমাদের এই বিশেষ আয়োজন ডায়বেটিস নিয়ন্ত্রণের A to Z-Diabetes Treatment  অ্যাপটি । বহুমূত্র রোগ, মধুমেহ বা ডায়াবেটিস মেলিটাস একটি হরমোন সংশ্লিষ্ট রোগ। দেহযন্ত্র অগ্ন্যাশয় যদি যথেষ্ট ইনসুলিন তৈরি করতে না পারে অথবা শরীর যদি উৎপন্ন ইনসুলিন ব্যবহারে ব্যর্থ হয়, তাহলে যে রোগ হয় তা হলো 'ডায়াবেটিস' বা 'বহুমূত্র রোগ'। তখন রক্তে চিনি বা শকর্রার উপস্থিতিজনিত অসামঞ্জস্য দেখা দেয়। ইনসুলিনের ঘাটতিই হল এ রোগের মূল কথা।

এই অ্যাপটিতে রয়েছে ডায়াবেটিস নিরাময়ে ভেষজ উদ্ভিদ (Herb for diabetes) এর ব্যবহার ও উপকারীতা। রয়েছে গর্ভকালীন সময়ে ডায়বেটিস সম্পর্কে বিস্তারিত পরামর্শ । ডায়াবেটিস রোগ ও নিরাময় অ্যাপ এ এই রোগ থেকে রক্ষা পাওয়ার সকল প্রকার উপায় নিয়ে আলোচনা করা হয়েছে। 

সুস্থ্য ও স্বাভাবিক জীবন যাপন করলে কোন অসুখ করবে না । তাই রুটিন মাফিক জীবন ব্যবস্থা গড়ে তুলতে হবে । নিয়মত ব্যায়াম ও ডায়েট যেন ঠিক থাকে সেদিকে নজর দিতে হবে । আল্লাহ আমাদের সকলকে সুস্থ ভাবে জীবন যাপন করার তৌফিক দান করুক। আমীন।

HTR Studio Present Medical app Diabetes Treatment A to Z bangla  (ডায়বেটিস নিয়ন্ত্রণের A to Z). Diabetes is a disease that occurs when your blood glucose, also called blood sugar, is too high. Blood glucose is your main source of energy and comes from the food you eat. Insulin, a hormone made by the pancreas, helps glucose from food get into your cells to be used for energy. It was first identified as a disease associated with "sweet urine," and excessive muscle loss in the ancient world. This app is All About Diabetes where everyone will learn Diabetes Guide in bengali- GlucoGuide. Diabetes Information can lead a Diabates patient to learn A to Z updated in 2020 about this serious and complex situation.

If anyone love  DIABETES TREATMENT (ডায়বেটিস নিয়ন্ত্রণের A to Z) 2020 app in bengali please share to everyone and rate us 5 * star. Thank You!!

এই অ্যাপটি ডাউনলোড করার জন্য এই লিংকটি অনুসরন করুন
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.htrstudio.diabetes_treatment

title: Safe Med Sensor
description:
Safe Med Sensor is a high-quality diabetes management tool to help make living with diabetes easier. This application helps you worry less and live life while handling the requirements needed for managing diabetes. The Safe Med Sensor app smartly provides you notifications to assist your lifestyle with diabetes. You'll receive notifications when your medications are approaching or out of safe temperature range when it is time to take your medications when it is time to measure your blood glucose and more. Our Safe Med Sensor diabetes management system:

Diabetes Smart Management System:
 - Know you’re storing your meds in safe temperatures
 - Schedule times to take your meds
 - Custom Glucose Timer 
 - Pre-loaded diabetes medication, glucometer and test strip libraries
 - Manage your caretakers
 - Provide caretakers with accurate information
 - Keep track and report side effects
 - Create reports to share with your doctor

Safe Med Sensor is a solution helping you to manage living with diabetes while keeping your medications at safe temperatures. When you buy our Safe Med Sensor device, we accompany the device with a free download of our unique Diabetes Smart Management System. The Safe Med Sensor device is a medication safe temperature monitoring sensor. Safe Med Sensor comes with wireless (BLE - Bluetooth Low Energy) smart sensor. Safe Med Sensor is a perfect partner for your medications, in the refrigerator or while traveling during your favorite excursions. Supports insulin, Humulin and other diabetic drugs

Perfect for monitoring Medications:
 - Stored in the refrigerator
 - Stored at room temperature
 - Carried with you all day
 - Transported in cool bags

The sensor is kept with your diabetes medications. Your digital thermometer sensor monitors the temperature of your medications 24 hours a day, 7 days a week continuously. At the same time, Safe Med Sensor constantly communicates with your diabetes smart management app on your phone. Safe Med Sensor alerts you when the temperature of your medications approaches or exceeds the safe temperature storage range provided by your medications’ manufacturer. Get notifications to remind you when you need it, so you can focus on the rest of your life. 

Perfect for helping to make living with diabetes easier

- Create reports to share with your doctor

Safe Med Sensor is a solution helping you to manage living with diabetes while keeping your medications at safe temperatures. When you buy our Safe Med Sensor device, we accompany the device with a free download of our unique Diabetes Smart Management System. The Safe Med Sensor device is a medication safe temperature monitoring sensor. Safe Med Sensor comes with wireless (BLE - Bluetooth Low Energy) smart sensor. Safe Med Sensor is a perfect partner for your medications, in the refrigerator or while traveling during your favorite excursions. Supports insulin, Humulin and other diabetic drugs

Perfect for monitoring Medications:
- Stored in the refrigerator
- Stored at room temperature
- Carried with you all day
- Transported in cool bags

The sensor is kept with your diabetes medications. Your digital thermometer sensor monitors the temperature of your medications 24 hours a day, 7 days a week continuously. At the same time, Safe Med Sensor constantly communicates with your diabetes smart management app on your phone. Safe Med Sensor alerts you when the temperature of your medications approaches or exceeds the safe temperature storage range provided by your medications’ manufacturer. Get notifications to remind you when you need it, so you can focus on the rest of your life.

Perfect for helping to make living with diabetes easier
summary: Safely helps users to live easier with diabetes. Works with Safe Med temp sensor
recentChanges: Improvements
comments: Amazing !!!

title: Vet-Tab
description:
The purpose of a glucose monitoring system is to help you, a diabetic dog owner, to regulate your dog’s glucose level. Many pet owners dislike lancing their dogs to draw blood to monitor their pets’ glucose with portable blood glucose meters (“PBGM”). They inject insulin daily without testing their pets' glucose, which can be dangerous to you dog’s health.

Vet-Tab is an at-home, glucose monitoring system allowing you to painlessly test your dog's saliva to monitor its blood glucose level with a tab and your smartphone. Saliva is collected on the tab, which turns a color based on the level of glucose. A smartphone app captures an image of the tab, similar to capturing an image of a check to be deposited. The app analyzes the image and displays a blood glucose result on your phone.

Many pet owners monitor their dogs’ glucose using Vet-Tab, which is significantly better than not monitoring glucose at all. In addition, monitoring your dog at home in a low stress environment can provide more accurate results than testing in a veterinary practice where stress raises your dog’s glucose level. When the result displayed is 80 or below, 350 or above, a message on the phone display advices you to contact your veterinarian for professional advice.

If you choose, a chart of your test results can be emailed from the app to your veterinarian. Your veterinarian can better regulate your dog’s glucose comparing your at-home test trends with clinical tests they perform in their clinic.

VET-TAB IS A WIN/WIN/WIN SOLUTION
- Your dog is healthier.
- You do not need to lance the dog to draw blood to monitor its glucose.
- Your veterinarian receives your at-home test results to help better regulate your dog.

VALIDATION OF THE VET-TAB SYSTEM
Development of the Vet-Tab system began in the summer of 2017. Since then thousands of tests on diabetic and non-diabetic dogs have been conducted by Dr. Rebecca Silveston-Keith, Chief Technology Officer, and the technical team in 20 veterinary practices in South Carolina and Georgia. The results of these tests have been reviewed with Dr. Delphine Dean, Gregg-Graniteville Professor of Bioengineering at Clemson University; Dr. David Dawkins, a veterinarian at the Eastside Animal Hospital in Spartanburg, SC; and Dr Cynthia Ward, VMD, PhD, DACVIM, Professor of Internal Medicine University of Georgia College of Veterinary Science

Field trials validated the accuracy of the Vet-Tab Glucose Monitoring System throughout 2018 with 150 dogs and culminated with a month long study of 54 dogs in participating veterinary practices. Nine dogs were disqualified because of interference factors, discussed below. Blood glucose determined by Vet-Tab was compared to the measurement of blood glucose by lab tests. Literature reporting data from the determination of glucose by continuous glucose monitors measuring interstitial fluid relative to blood tests for diabetic pets showed a similar level of accuracy as the Vet-Tab data. Continuous glucose monitors are well accepted devices for monitoring blood glucose in diabetic patients.

The accuracy of the Vet-Tab system is sufficient for its use in at-home, glucose monitoring of diabetic dogs.

As is true with other glucose monitoring systems, there are factors that interfere with the Vet-Tab system. We have incorporated features into the system to address the first two of these factors.

Vet-Tab is not currently supported on -LG and Motorola phones
Pets taking the following medications: Gabapentin, Fluoextine, Alprazolam, Tramadol, or LThyroxine. Contact support@vet-tab.com of you have concerns about other medications.

title: Diabetes Tracker
description:
Get rid of pen and pencil to write down your blood sugar test results! It is now much easier to calculate & track your blood sugar level, insulin intake & do so much more! 

Diabetes can and must be kept in check not just by having the right sugar levels in the body but also by the intake of proper diet and exercise regimes. Specifically designed for smart phones this amazing app is intended to help diabetics to manage better their diabetes and keep it under control. 

We have big plans for this app and look forward to make it as useful as possible for those trying to control their Diabetes & Insulin levels. The current version brings:

1. Glucometer: Manage your Diabetes levels effectively by tracking your glucose levels. View current, detailed or average readings in a list view or via detailed graphs and reports.
2. Medicine Tracker: Keep a track of your Insulin intake and all your Medicines. Schedule reminders to track the medicines that are taken and those that are dismissed.
3. Doctors & Appointments: Maintain an extensive list of Doctors and call them from within the app. Add & view all your Current and Previous Appointments so that you never miss any.
4. Food: Log all your meals in the Diet Diary. View easy to make, tasty recipes along with Diet Guidelines for the various types of diabetes and Superfoods that will help you to keep a check on your glucose levels.
5. Exercise: Comprehensive exercises including a warm-up, yoga poses, and aerobics with proper instructions and images, to help curb and improve your diabetes levels.
6. Reports: View reports of all modules in the App Reports section. Click a pic of and save all your health reports, in Lab Reports. Easily share them with your doctor.
7. Reminders: Remembering to test your sugar is always a problem, that's why in in this Diabetes app there are reminders that are associated with events so you'll never forget to test again!Reminders to check Blood Glucose, have your medicines, keep all your appointments and maintain exercise schedules.
8. Expenses: Log your Expenses as you spend! View your Total and Average Spend along with the details of each entry.
9. Blood Pressure Tracker: Blood Pressure Tracker helps you to record your blood pressure, anywhere, anytime. 

This app is actually noteworthy for those who seek perfection of body & mind!
 
Diabetes Tracker  is simple, quick, effective and proven! Manage your diabetes using Diabetes Tracker and take control of your diabetes today!

Whats Special

• Easy to use interface 
• Detailed graphs and reports
• Supports both US (mg/dl) & Standard (mmo/l) units.
• Rich & Intelligent functions	
• Easy to understand	
• Fast & Smooth Performance	
• Clear & Intuitive design	
• Fully Loaded Features	
• Phone Resource friendly	
• Friendly Widget

*Ads & IAP

This Smart App contains a wide range of amazing features, thus please consider that it contains in-app purchases to unlock some Pro Features via Mewards (Real & Virtual Money)

Benefits of Mewards

- Amazing offers to look out for!
- Use earned coins to unlock Premium features !
- Track the status of your Credits!

Note: Please consult your Doctor before you start any suggested exercise regime or consume any food.

For any kind of help or confusion, simply write to us, and we would happily resolve your problems in a quick friendly manner. Kindly do not leave us any negative stars, we're here to help. Thanks :)

title: Diabète - Calculate your insulin bonus
description:
The EFIT application was created by a diabetic for diabetics.
Its operation is very simple:

When using for the first time, fill in your glucose targets, your Ratio(s), your insulin sensitivity. You have three additional parameters to reduce your bolus by a certain percentage during physical activity after the meal. 

These values ​​can be modified as desired.

It is strongly advised to inform the values ​​transmitted by your diabetologist. To calculate the bolus insulin, provide your blood sugar as well as the number of carbohydrates.

Choose physical activity: no activity, low activity, moderate activity, intense activity.

Finally click on "calculate"

EFIT takes into account all the parameters to calculate the suggested insulin bolus.

title: BolusControl
description:
BolusControl is designed for insulin dependant diabetics with bolus & basal treatment - also called Functional Insulin Treatment - and ultra-rapid acting insulin such as NovoRapid, Insuline ultra-rapide HUG®, Humalog® or Apidra®.

Thanks to a glycemia before and after lunch, the app is able to tell if the correct amount of bolus has been made or if you need an adjusment (insulin ou sugar), thus keeping your diabetes under control.

BolusControl can handle slow or fast carbs meal.

Advices provided by BolusControl cannot supersede doctors' recommendations. 

This app cannot be held responsible in case of problem.

title: A1C Blood Sugar Calculator Tracker Diabetes app
description:
Diabetes app to stay ON TRACK and stay MOTIVATED!
Simple and straightforward diabetes app, to convert to and from your blood sugar blood glucose monitor reading to A1C. 
Log and track your glucose readings, food notes and calculate average A1C over pre-set months with one tap or pick your own dates!

* Convert blood sugar / blood glucose monitor reading to A1C (used at your doctor's, and vis-a-vis)
* Log your blood sugar / blood glucose monitor readings, a1c and track your a1c averages
* Add food notes to your blood sugar / blood glucose log
* Set your preference to track glucose / blood sugar levels in mg/dL OR mmol/L
* Look up Glycemic index and load for common foods and serving sizes
* Color coded Red / Green and Orange zones
* Your diabetes blood sugar / blood glucose log stored on your phone (not the internet)

comments: I've been using this app for a couple years. The readings showed my A1C as being 5.5 last year. When I went to my PCP, he took my A1C and it was actually 6.7. I continued to use it and my latest 90 day reading was 6.1..I went on 5/15/20 to get a reading and it was 7.8. I record several times a day so I'm not understanding the inaccuracy. I'm very disappointed and will most likely uninstall this app and find another more accurate app.
Very easy to use. A larger capacity, 500 characters, Note field in the upcoming (?) Premium version would be nice as I currently track my meals using abbreviated words for food.

I have the same problem as Laurie Jeter. Your app is understated by .7 on the last three A1C blood tests that I have taken. In order to continue to use your app I am adding .7 to my readings so I am not supprised by the results. At least there is consistency.
Doesn't work at all. Keyboard doesn't pop up when I try add reading. I have Uninstalled several times still nothing.

Helpful app - until I upgraded from the S8 to the S10 (Pie}. Now I have no menu within the app to access its other features. It's a great app, but I could use some help accessing my log and 30, 90 day averages. Update: I just discovered that the menu is still there, it's just "hidden". When I tap the top left corner of the app, it opens the menu. Even though, on my version, there is no menu icon visible. I'm back!

title: Amazing Foods to Heal Your Pancreas Quicker
description:
The pancreas is about 6 inches long and sits across the back of the abdomen, behind the stomach. The head of the pancreas is on the right side of the abdomen and is connected to the duodenum (the first section of the small intestine) through a small tube called the pancreatic duct. The narrow end of the pancreas, called the tail, extends to the left side of the body.

            Pancreas Conditions

Diabetes, type 1: The body’s immune system attacks and destroys the pancreas’ insulin-producing cells. Lifelong insulin injections are required to control blood sugar.

Diabetes, type 2: The pancreas loses the ability to appropriately produce and release insulin. The body also becomes resistant to insulin, and blood sugar rises.

Cystic fibrosis: A genetic disorder that affects multiple body systems, usually including the lungs and the pancreas. Digestive problems and diabetes often result.
Pancreatic cancer: The pancreas has many different types of cells, each of which can give rise to a different type of tumor. The most common type arises from the cells that line the pancreatic duct. Because there are usually few or no early symptoms, pancreatic cancer is often advanced by the time it’s discovered.

Pancreatitis: The pancreas becomes inflamed and damaged by its own digestive chemicals. Swelling and death of tissue of the pancreas can result. Although alcohol or gallstones can contribute, sometimes a cause for pancreatitis is never found.
Pancreatic pseudocyst: After a bout of pancreatitis, a fluid-filled cavity called a pseudocyst can form. Pseudocysts may resolve spontaneously, or they may need surgical drainage.
Islet cell tumor: The hormone-producing cells of the pancreas multiply abnormally, creating a benign or cancerous tumor.  These tumors produce excess amounts of hormones and then release them into the blood. Gastrinomas, glucagonomas, and insulinomas are examples of islet cell tumors.

Enlarged pancreas: An enlarged pancreas may mean nothing. You may simply have a pancreas that is larger than normal. Or, it can be because of an anatomic abnormality. But other causes of an enlarged pancreas may exist and require treatment.
    
          Pancreas Tests

Physical examination: By pressing on the center of the belly, a doctor might check for a mass in the pancreas. He or she can also look for other signs of pancreas conditions.
Computed tomography scan: A CT scanner takes multiple X-rays, and a computer creates detailed images of the pancreas and abdomen. Contrast dye may be injected into your veins to improve the images.
Magnetic resonance imaging (MRI): Magnetic waves create highly detailed images of the abdomen. Magnetic resonance cholangiopancreatography (MRCP) is an MRI that focuses on the pancreas, liver, and bile system.
Endoscopic retrograde cholangiopancreatography (ERCP): Using a camera on a flexible tube advanced from the mouth to the intestine, a doctor can access the area of the pancreas head. Tiny surgical tools can be used to diagnose and treat some pancreas conditions.
Pancreas biopsy: Either using a needle through the skin or a surgical procedure, a small piece of pancreas tissue is removed to look for cancer or other conditions.
Ultrasound: A probe is placed on the belly, and harmless sound waves create images by reflecting off the pancreas and other organs.
Amylase and lipase: Blood tests showing elevated levels of these pancreatic enzymes can suggest pancreatitis.
Sweat chloride test: A painless electric current stimulates the skin to sweat, and the chloride in perspiration is measured. People with cystic fibrosis often have high sweat chloride levels.
Genetic testing: Many different mutations of a single gene can cause cystic fibrosis. Genetic testing can help identify if an adult is an unaffected carrier or if a child will develop cystic fibrosis.
   
       Pancreas Treatments;
Insulin  Injection
Pseudocyst drainage
Pseudocyst surgery
pancreatic cancer
Pancreatic enzymes
Pancreas transplantation

title: Insulin Buddy
description:
You know that. Before each meal you must estimate the carbohydrates and then manage the correct units of insulin. Pretty boring what? Insulin buddy helps you manage the right units of insulin. You just have to specify how much carbohydrate you take to you and the app automatically shows the appropriate units for you. Cool what? All what you need are your insulin values you got from your doctor!

How does it work?
◉ It is important that you know your insulin factors (morning, noon and evening)
◉ Enter your factors in the app (e.g. 10g carbohydrates = 1.5 units of insulin)
◉ The app shows the appropriate amount of insulin for a meal based on your values
◉ All what you need are your insulin values you got from your doctor!
 
Features:
◉ Insulin buddy has been developed for type 1 diabetics
◉ You can enter various insulin factors (morning, noon, and evening)
◉ You can also enter insulin corrections (morning, noon, and evening)
◉ Optimized for Microsoft mobile & desktop devices
◉ Supports mmol/L und mg/dL
◉ Clear and easy to use user interface
 
Please consider the following:
Discuss with your doctor how high your insulin factor is for morning, noon and evening for each 10g of carbohydrates. It is very important that you know these values ​​exactly.

Your insulin factor changes depending on the time of day. Determine these factors for morning, noon and evening.

If you are doing sports, are sick, or simply run a little beside the role, the insulin factor also changes. For special activities, you need to customize your insulin therapy because the values ​​in the app only reflect the "normal" state.

Insulin buddy is an assistance, not a sorcerer. Please use the app only if you know exactly Diabetes Mellitus and your values. Also check your insulin units on paper and compare the results with the app. Be always attentive in dealing with insulin and prefer to measure your sugar level again than vice versa.
 
 
Please feel free to contact us with any questions or feedback about insulin buddy!
mmol@insulin-buddy.com

All what you need are your insulin values you got from your doctor!

◉ It is important that you know your insulin factors (morning, noon and evening)

title: GlucoMe
description:
A personal diabetes management application.
Provides log, charts, reminders and alerts, statistics, ability to share, estimated HbA1c and more. Can connect to your clinic.
Connects to GlucoMe blood glucose monitor as well as to Accu Chek Guide, Contour Next One, Walgreens True Metrix Air, CVS Health True Metrix Air Bluetooth blood glucose monitors and more.

A personal diabetes management application.

Connects to GlucoMe blood glucose monitor as well as to Accu Chek Guide, Contour Next One, Walgreens True Metrix Air, CVS Health True Metrix Air Bluetooth blood glucose monitors and more.
summary: A personal diabetes and glucose management application.
recentChanges:
New Home - manage and measure
Simpler login
Bug fixes
comments: It's ok. Definitely not great. • No way to log med dosages, especially as I want to track how much insulin I'm taking each time and with certain readings. Haven't been using the app all that long, but more than long enough to be frustrated with having to • repeatedly kill the app, • turn off my meter, • turn them back on and "hope" it updates. This morning it took no less than turning the meter on and off at least 5 or 6 times and app at least 3 or 4 kills before it finally picked up the current reading. There's no where I've found that you can hit a refresh for it to activate and upload a reading. The "Connect" on the Home does nothing. You can tap and try swipe in every possible direction with absolutely nothing happening with the app.

This app is easy to use, with a clean dashboard and an intuitive interface. It appears that some potential functions yet are to be developed fully, as evidenced by filter options and suggested titles in reports. However, it is a good app for monitoring blood glucose and better than the one provided by the manufacturer of my device.
Great app. Just love that I don't have keep a "diary" easy to keep track of weight and glucose trends.
Great app. Interfaces with my Bayer Contour Next ONE over Bluetooth to get my glucose readings.
wrong readings after recent upgrade, also after each upgrade app ask for all details each time and it is frustrating. Old data is no more available after updates, very poor quality app

title: SiDiary Diabetes Management
description:
To work with a diabetes logbook on your Android device is very simple with SiDiary. You can track all relevant data for your therapy like blood glucose, carbohydrates, medication like insulin and so on quick in a simple data mask to make it visible on your Android device. You can analyze it with the statistic function or with our trend analysis.

If you already use the PC version of SiDiary to read out your meters, insulin pump, etc. - you can add this data also to your Android device by simply synchronizing it with SiDiary Online.

The features of this app so far:

•	easiest entry of all data with the numeric keypad
•	all data can be tracked with a scrollable input mask
•	clearly arranged display of your daily data in SiDiary's typical style
•	lots of statistic-graphics (pie chart, line graph, modal day and detailed statistic)
•	trend analysis (how was the progress of your therapy in the last days/weeks/months?)
•	fast synchronization of your data with 'SDiary Online', from where you are able to print your data stand-alone from your operating system or synchronize the data with your desktop computer version of SiDiary
•	option for automatically synchronization (after shut down the app and/or at midnight)
•	user defined data types, which you have defined in your pc-version can also be used on the Android after a synchronization with 'SiDiary Online'
•	blood glucose values can be entered in mg/dl or mmol/l
•	body weight can be entered in kg or lbs
•	carbohydrates can be entered in gram or any other exchange unit (such as BE/KE, etc.)
•	date format dd.mm or mm-dd
•	time format 24h or 12h am/pm
•	data rows that you don't want to use can be hidden

Compatible meters:
- AktivMed GlucoChek Gold
- Ascensia Contour Next One
- Beurer AS81
- Beurer AS87
- Beurer AS97
- Beurer BC57
- Beurer BF700
- Beurer BF710
- Beurer BF800
- Beurer BF850
- Beurer BM57
- Beurer BM85
- Beurer GL50 Evo BLE
- Beurer GL50 Evo NFC
- Beurer GS485
- Cignus Profi Line
- Cignus Profi Line BLE
- Fora Diamond Mini
- Fora Diamond Mini BLE
- Menarini Glucomen Areo

You can use 'SiDiary Android' stand-alone, but this version can also enhance the pc-version - e.g. you can download readings from your blood glucose meter, insulin pump, blood pressure meter or pedometer with your pc-version and enter additional data on the way in your Android version. After synchronizing your desktop computer and your Android both with 'SiDiary Online' all of your data will be merged into one logbook. Since synchronization with 'SiDiary Online' will be started manually - you always have the full control of possible costs for your online connection.

You can use the app in the adware mode (with commercial ads) as long as you wish. Please note that in this mode only the last 7 calendar days can be synchronized with SiDiary Online.

The app claims for the following rights (legend in brackets):
•	read phone state and identity (to build the apps serial number)
•	your roughly estimated (network-based) location (for commercial ads in your language)
•	full internet access (download ads and transfer data on demand to SiDiary Online)
•	storage (to store data locally on your device)
•	paid services (send short messages: optional, must be turned on first: when the blood glucose is exceeding or falling below the limit values a SMS can be send to a predetermined number (eg, to the parents or the diabetes team)
•       system tools (to establish Bluetooth connection to Fora Diamond Mini BT glucose meter by request)

comments: I have used this software on my PC and now on my phone and I have no complaints about this software or the database so I have a backup copy of my data if I ever need it. the only added functionality might be to add a bar chart of daily averages over the course of a week. Then I could see which days I need to watch my carb//calorie input.
I find it very good. I miss an online manual/description of the functions.

Still needs improvement. App is unable to directly import readings from Accu-Chek meters, either via cable or bluetooth. Overly cumbersome and unclear on many levels. I've used SiDiary online for several years, but still has a long way to go towards being great. Edit to add: I've used the desktop version of SiDiary for nearly a decade. It's still cumbersome and in need of improvement.
A little confusing first but it's ok. Sync is inconvenient and takes forever when there is a lot of data.
I understood that I could sync up between computer and phone. I couldn't do this. uninstall reinstall app then it updated

title: Diabetic diet
description:
🔴 Diabetic diet, discover how it should be and your diet

✔️ A diabetes diet is a healthy-eating plan that's naturally rich in nutrients and low in fat and calories. Key elements are fruits, vegetables and whole grains.

🥗 A healthy diet helps keep blood sugar at an adequate level. Discover what to eat with the delicious recipes for diabetics.

➡️ Nutrition and physical activity are important parts of a healthy lifestyle when you have diabetes.

📔 Enjoy the best recipes for diabetes. They are perfect, very varied and delicious.

⭐Diabetic Diet includes:
- What is diabetes ?
- Prediabetes
- Diabetes Type 1 and 2
- Exercises for diabetes
- Best foods
- Worst foods
- Week menu
- Guide healthy eating
- Tips to beat diabetes
- Easy test
- Diabetic recipes

⚠️ A healthy diet can help you prevent, control, and even reverse diabetes.
❕ Diabetes is a disease characterized by abnormally high blood sugar levels (hyperglycaemia) due to an insulin deficit or an inefficient insulin function.

❓ If you have any question or doubt or wish to contribute something, please let us know. Thank you.

title: MedAngel ONE - Keep medications (insulin) safely
description:
MedAngel ONE is a solution that helps you keep your medications at the right temperature. It consists of a wireless smart sensor and a mobile app.

Ideal for all Insulins, Humira, Enbrel, Cimzia, Orencia, EpiPen, hormones...

Get your sensor here now: https://medangel.co/

The sensor is placed with the medications, it continuously measures the temperature and communicates with your phone. The App alerts you when the temperature approaches or exceeds the safe range for your medications.

Perfect for:
- Stored medications in the refrigerator
- Medications carried around all day
- Medications transported in cool bags

recentChanges: Android 10 crash fix
comments: Worked great until several months ago. An new system update now forces app into power saving when not active on screen even though white listed. Reported to developer. No updates. Pretty expensive thermometer now as I need to run the program and, after a few minutes, get connected for its buffered data. No real live updates or alarms due to back ground sleep. Lost connectivity due to power saving is reported issue. Was awesome while it worked.

very useful but nit user friendly. every time i open the data i dont want to zoom in 50 times to see the last 1hr 6hr and day info which is relevant. who cares about last month? should default to showing last 3hrs and allow zoom out from there. have some buttons to change scope to last hrs last day etc... also.. after synch lots if missing data points

As many others have written, the app crashes constantly on Android 10. They simply don't respond to requests for help or seem to care about their customers in any way. If they hired a decent software engineer, the problems would be solved in minutes instead of months, but the company's lack of communication is really unacceptable. UPDATE: The issue was eventually fixed, and the system works as designed again. Hopefully, if any similar issues arise in the future, they'll be resolved faster.

Not sure what happened to the app notification but mine has stopped working. I have two MedAngels I keep track of, but as of right now the notification is saying app not responding. I have a Google pixel.... It looks like other people are having the same difficulty. A reply would be nice considering the cost of these little devices. ?

Crashes once I get past a certain point in setup and then constantly thereafter. Developer has not replied to my open support ticket for three weeks and counting. Update: Finally got in touch *four months* later to ask me to update my review, without any email contact. The app is working now, but this level of unresponsiveness is unacceptable.

title: Diabetic Calculator Full
description:
For all those addicted to fancy app features, this app got none. It's workhorse for people struggling with T1 diabetes.
If you were using trial version of Diabetic Calculator, you have to know that it will start to nag you to buy full version after 4 mths from last update. Install this version, then in trial version perform "backup", and then "restore" in this version. Whole stored data will be transferred.
 
Application is mainly aimed at diabetics T1, it may be of some use for other types of diabetes.

Diabetes, particularly type 1, is a very serious illness, restricting freedom of  the way you eat. 
To give some more freedom in choice of meals, diabetes educators teach patients to calculate their carbohydrates intake in their food, which in turn, together with current glucose level, can optimize amount of insulin they should inject.
 But, off-course you have to read nutrition labels, weigh your meals and do some math. 

Because my wife has fallen sick with type 1 diabetes, after visits to diabetic educators, I decided to write for her simple program where she can create database of foods she eats, and which will do carbohydrates counting for her.

 I used desktop database application and put it on her laptop.
After about 3 years of her using software religiously before every meal, somebody asked me if I could write application version of program for  smartphone. 
This applications does not create fancy reports, sends emails to your doctor, reads world foods database or scans bar codes on packaging.
When you start, it only contains  carbohydrates and calories info for basic foods like apple, potato, water etc..
 My wife, and you, put nutrition info into calculator, as you get new foods from the shop. And that's it, till you get something new to eat...Or you cook new meal, out of recipe, or your fantasy, you give it a name and put into database. Carbohydrates and calories are calculated for you. 
You can also judge "by eye" carbohydrates in your meal, and calculator will give you equivalent of insulin you have to counter it with (plus glucose correction).
 My wife's' glucose meter and its software takes care of all diabetic statistics, and it's not big deal to send email with reports it creates, to her doctor, she does it every fortnight.
I've added statistics screen, where she can view her data statistics over chosen period of time, to get quick idea how she goes ( with glucose, carbohydrates and calories).
 But mainly she wants to have database of carbohydrates content of foods she actually eats, either ready food or self-prepared meals, to use it to compile her meal and let application to calculate carbohydrates content. 
Then measure glucose level and get suggested insulin dose based on her meal carbohydrates content and blood glucose level.
Too complex apps only create confusion, especially among older people.

Units of glucose level are irrelevant (mmo/L or mg/dL), provided Target and Glucose Correction Factor are expressed in the same units!

title: Center Health — The Diabetes App
description:
See all of your data in one place 📱 • Sync CGMs + fitness trackers ⌚️ • Search carbs 🥨 • Your very own virtual assistant 🔮 • All for free! 🎉

* * *

Welcome to Center Health for Android!

+ Beautiful, easy to use apps for Android and web (iOS and Windows Phone too!)

+ Real-time stats — make quicker, more accurate decisions based on your current status

+ Analysis views — keep an eye on your overall trends with daily, weekly, monthly, and quarterly stats

+ Estimated HbA1C — no more guesswork or unwelcome surprises

+ Logbook view — complement your sleek dashboard with a traditional timeline view

+ Full integration with Google Fit — import meals, exercise, and sleep in real-time

+ Advanced food logging — automated carb counting, barcode scanning, and ingredient search from our comprehensive nutritional database

+ Dexcom API sync — import CGM readings, meals, insulin, and exercise in real-time

+ Manual logging done right — log everything from blood sugar, insulin, and carbs, to exercise, sleep, feelings, and more, without frustration

+ Spreadsheet imports — upload data from a variety of sources, including other diabetes apps and devices like Dexcom CGMs and the FreeStyle Libre

+ Real-time sync — pick up where you left off on all of your devices

* * *

This is just the start! We're hard at work on a number of amazing features.

We live for feedback. Please don't hesitate to get in touch with any ideas, questions, or issues, via email or on social media:

Email: yourfriends@center.health
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/centerhealthapp
Twitter: https://twitter.com/centerhealth_
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/centerhealth_
Snapchat: https://www.snapchat.com/add/centerhealth

See you soon <3

comments: I love my Nano and Center Health app. It's so easy to use, and I love that it is all tracked right in my phone. And not just my numbers, but other important information too. It's been a great change and helps me manage my blood sugars so much better.

App is painfully slow to load. Response time for a reading is completely unacceptable and for the price, there are competitors that can match the cost of test strips. Also, customer service is horrendous.

This app, along with the Center Health Nano glucometer, is a game-changer for me! I've been using it for almost a month & I've learned so much about how different things (meals, medications, exercise, etc) affect my blood sugar. It's easy to use, inexpensive, & actually makes me enjoy getting my readings. I highly recommend it for anyone with diabetes.

At first it seemed like a great idea, and the app while slow, worked great. My reading were accurate compared to other tests. The ISSUE is that I've tried MULTIPLE times to pause my subscription because I've got too many strips and they CONTINUE to charge me anyway. The app does not have a SEND button for messaging them so you are in good faith that your request got through!!

Love the app, however. I have had to uninstall it 3 times in the po ast several months. I keeps locking up and tonight before I uninstalled the app it worked for 30 minutes without o po ening up. I have changed the battery 2 ti mb es I have an Android and it is a po ain to use this app. When it works it is great

title: My DiabetesConnect
description:
We are proud to introduce worlds first complete diabetes care app, My DiabetesConnect(Diabetes is not just about blood glucose)!
 
My name Dr Ryizan Nizar MD MRCPUK and I am determined to make diabetes care more accessible and affordable to everyone.

Where you live or what you earn should not determine the Diabetes care you get!

This App offers people the opportunity to store and track their health data for a small yearly subscription. It will also graph all your data and show what your targets are as well as your current standing in relation to such targets.

My DiabetesConnect will do all the thinking for you.
 
The dashboard:- With this one screen you can see an overview of your diabetes control with colour-coded tiles that change colour to indicate which aspects need urgent action/above target/at target. The tiles will also notify when a certain test is overdue. Now you are in complete control.

PDF Reports:- Create and share PDF reports with your doctor in an instant. This will help your doctor make more informed decisions by analysing all your records over months/years.

Blood Glucose Screen:-This app has meal specific targets and you can instantly know if a certain blood glucose reading is high with the App's easy to understand colour coding. Readings will go red if it needs immediate attention, amber if high and green if in target.
 
BMI Screen- App will auto calculate your target weight once you enter your height and you will be able to easily see your progress in achieving these target.
 
HbA1c Screen:- Track your HbA1c over several years and you can easily track your progress, after all, Diabetes is all about trends.
 
Blood Pressure:- Now it's easy to track your blood pressure with My DiabetesConnect, know when it is too high and you can see trends over months/years.
 
Kidney Function (Blood test):- Track your kidney function overtime to make sure they are healthy. See the trends and know early if kidney function is deteriorating.
 
Kidney Function(Urine test):- Often this is the first sign of trouble that would indicate diabetes is starting to affect your kidney. Knowing early can help your doctor treat early and prevent/delay kidney failure.

Cholesterol:- Track your cholesterol over months/years. It's all about trends.

Eye and Feet Check:- Keep a track of your eye and feet screening. The App will remind you when you are due for your next eye appointment.

Medication:- Now you can keep track of all your medications with this one App. What's more, you can also store all your stopped medications so your doctor knows what you had been on before. that didn't work.

Diagnosis:- Keep track of all your diagnoses.
 

SUPPORT:
We're always working to make the My DiabetesConnect App better, and we need your feedback! Have a problem, criticism, question, or praise? Get in touch:
 
Email: support@mydiabetesconnect.co.uk
WhatsApp: Technical support can be accessed within the App.
WebSite: https://mydiabetesconnect.uk
Facebook: @diabetesRN
Instagram: @mydiabetesconnect
 
 
Terms and conditions:
https://www.termsfeed.com/terms-conditions/144bfc4620e851d4e9d46b228fa15ad0

 
###

comments: Great app. Very easy to use and provides a detailed report for tracking and providing real data to assist doctors and myself in diabetes management. Highly recommend it for its functionality and value for money in the detail they put into the app. Useful tips and news feeds as well provide helpful information at a glance. First time user and lifetime customer now (or when I can beat this disease). I found using the app helps me be more accountable about my diabetes management. Real data beats anecdotal evidence and the figures don't lie. With the inclusion of a free text field in the Blood Glucose section in the next version update, I'll now be able to input my food intake as well which will bring together everything I need to collect the data that will help me monitor my progress and diet. Keep up the good work Dr Nizar and thank you for providing this app.

Very easy to use App, like how the dashboard is organised. Tiles change colour according to my latest results so it's easy to know what to focus. Meal time targets are easy to understand. Helpful tile on tracking weight. Finally like how it's so easy to share data with PDF.

Amazing app. Can save all diabetes tests in one place, dashboard is amazing with tiles that change color to depending on the latest result! Like the meal specific targets. HbA1c is converted to an average blood glucose so it's easy to relate to it.
Excellent very user friendly app to have all your health records related to diabetes at your finger tips. Highly recommended to anyone who wants to keep track on past records.
Very helpful app

title: Betes - Your Diabetes Diary
description:
Betes is an ideal logbook app for people suffering from type 1 diabetes.
Users can add logs with information about blood sugar level, eaten carbs, injected insulin or physical activity.
You can personalize the diabetes diary to your needs with almost no effort, thanks to configuration screen.
Your data is displayed on easily readable list, with clearly marked consecutive days.
You can see statistics from different time periods and analyze your diabetic trends.

Application Betes offers:
- Clean look and no ads.
- Configuration screen.
- Possibility to add, edit, delete logs.
- Possibility to add notes.
- Weekly, bi-weekly, monthly, quarterly and total diabetic statistics.
- No challenges and mini games. Because your life is not a game!

Tags: diabetes, diabetic, logbook, diary, blood sugar, diabetes diary

comments: When setting up you have to choose how you get your insulin or you can't go further, some of us aren't on insulin. I like the functionality described, but can't see it for myself.

There's more than 1 type of diabetes, and those of us who don't have Type 1 
still need to check our glucose. The app forces you to choose insulin- 
whether you use it or not. That's a shame and rather shortsighted.
Not nice

title: DIABNEXT Make your diabetes management easy
description:
DIABNEXT is a free app loaded with features to help you prevent and manage diabetes. The connected devices allow automatic data transfer into the DIABNEXT app, to better monitor and manage the disease (injection of insulin, blood glucose levels).
Hassle-free diabetes life!

DIABNEXT app features:
- Easy manual and/or automatic logging of diabetes metrics (blood glucose, insulin injection, activity, plate's picture and more).
- Syncs seamlessly data directly to your smartphone then you always have information available when you need.
- Daily, weekly and monthly data graphs analysis.
- Connect with a worldwide community of people with diabetes and share your thoughts.
- Share your data with your trusted care network.

DIABNEXT's key advantages:
- Universal, adapted to all insulin pens and glucose meters on the market.
- Automatic, 100% accurate and exhaustive data recording.
- No additional constraint.
- It is an easy and a complete tracker of key parameters of the diabetes management (Insulin injection dose, blood glucose level)
-It offers Apple Health® Integration by writing all entries to the Health app.

Your privacy is guaranteed, and all your data is secure.

DIABNEXT has won numerous prestigious awards for innovation and healthcare:
- Two CES Innovation awards.
- DIABNEXT® won the prestigious 2017 DIABETES FRENCH GOVERNMENT DIABETES INNOVATION CHALLENGE organized by the French government and its healthcare arm “Assurance Maladie”.
- DIABNEXT® won The Trailblazer Company of the Year Award in the Medical Device category in 2017. DIABNEXT was on the cover of the national magazine, Oct edition.
- Finalist of the innovation award at the Lyfebulb - Novo Nordisk innovation summit 2017.

We're constantly improving our app so that we can offer you the best possible diabetes management tool. We need your feedback to be the most powerful diabetes app. Please send us your feedback:
support@diabnext.com
If you think we're doing a great job, then please rate us and share your experience with DIABNEXT.

Have any questions?
If you like to know more or have any questions about our Diabnext mobile app, please get in touch with our customer service support@diabnext.com and visit 
www.diabnext.com

title: Diabetes Type 1
description:
Diabetes, type 1: An autoimmune disease that occurs when T cells attack and destroy most of the beta cells in the pancreas that are needed to produce insulin, so that the pancreas makes too little insulin (or no insulin). Without the capacity to make adequate amounts of insulin, the body is not able to metabolize blood glucose (sugar), to use it efficiently for energy, and toxic acids (called ketoacids) build up in the body. There is a genetic predisposition to type 1 diabetes.

The disease tends to occur in childhood, adolescence or early adulthood (before age 30) but it may have its clinical onset at any age. The symptoms and signs of type 1 diabetes characteristically appear abruptly, although the damage to the beta cells may begin much earlier and progress slowly and silently.

The symptoms and signs include a great thirst, hunger, a need to urinate often, and loss of weight. Among the risks of the disease are serious complications, among them blindness, kidney failure, extensive nerve damage, and accelerated atherosclerosis. The long-term aim with treatment is to avoid these complications or, at the least, to slow their progression. There is no known cure.

To treat the disease, the person must inject insulin, follow a diet plan, exercise adequately (ideally, daily), and test their blood glucose several times a day.

This type of diabetes used to be known as "juvenile diabetes," "juvenile-onset diabetes," and "ketosis-prone diabetes." It is now called type 1 diabetes mellitus or insulin-dependent diabetes.

App Features:
1. What is Type 1 Diabetes?
2. How Many People Have Diabetes?
3. How do health care professionals diagnose type 1 diabetes?
4. Type 1 Diabetes Symptoms
5. Type 1 Diabetes Causes
6. Type 1 Diabetes Risk Factors
7. Diagnosing Diabetes
8. What medicines do I need to treat my type 1 diabetes?
9. Can I lower my chance of developing type 1 diabetes?
10. Type 1 Diabetes Complications
11. Type 1 Diabetes Prevention
12. Type 1 Diabetes Facts and Tips
13. Type 1 Diabetes and Exercise
14. Type 1 Diabetes and Insulin
15. Type 1 Diabetes FAQ What is type 1 diabetes?
16. Apps Info

Important note :
Please consult with your doctor, or other qualified health care professional if you have experienced any difficulty or pain when following this diet plan. Please follow this App method at your own risk.

Feedback:-
If you have any suggested features or improvement, please leave a comment. In case something is not working correctly please let me know. When posting low rating please describe what is wrong to give the possibility to fix that issue.

title: OneTouch Reveal® Plus Digital Diabetes Coach
description:
*** OneTouch Reveal® Plus is only available via access code from your employer or health plan. ***

OneTouch Reveal® Plus app is a digital diabetes coach that provides real-time support, works in partnership with your healthcare team, and helps you build self-care skills that can lead to better diabetes management.  OneTouch Reveal® Plus app is FDA cleared for Type 1 and Type 2 adults 18+ with diabetes.

REAL-TIME PERSONALIZED DIABETES GUIDANCE
•	Receive real-time, customized coaching messages with each blood glucose result – anytime, anywhere.
•	AI technology provides thousands of customized messages based on your blood glucose values and trends
•	Helps guide you through hypoglycemia episodes with prompts about what to do next 
•	Provides helpful tips to address high blood glucose results

SUPPORT FOR HEALTHIER EATING
•	Build your meal by choosing a recipe, searching the database, or adding your own food
•	Snap a picture or scan barcodes to identify nutrition information identify nutrition information or add a food to your food diary
•	Create healthy meal plans and share them with others
•	Share your Grocery list and/or order the ingredients online 
•	Restaurant Helper feature helps you find foods that fit your carb range when eating out

DIABETES MANAGEMENT TOOLS PROVIDE SUPPORT BETWEEN DOCTOR VISITS
•	Organize all your insulin and oral medications and set reminders  
•	You can import your medication and lab results by connecting to your pharmacy or lab
•	Logbook helps you track your daily glucose, food, activity, and sleep 
•	Weekly reports and insights highlight what’s working and offers suggestions what to change
•	Share progress with your care team by sending a SMART Visit Report with the click of a button
•	Get educational support via OneTouch U™ with short, easy-to-read lessons
•	Get answers to general diabetes questions from Certified Diabetes Educators using the ‘Ask an Educator’ feature

VIEW YOUR HEALTH INFORMATION IN ONE PLACE  
•	Sync information from a device you are already using -  OneTouch Reveal® Plus connects to over 20 different devices (including BG meters, weight scales, blood pressure cuffs and activity trackers) allowing you to view all your health information in the app 
•	Sync your blood sugar results seamlessly from the OneTouch Verio Flex® meter or the OneTouch Verio Reflect® meter
•	Connect your Fitbit®, Garmin®, Misfit™, Polar®, Strava, or Withings activity tracker to see exercise, steps, sleep, height and weight
•	Syncs with Google Fit® so you can view your steps, activities, sleep, blood glucose, blood pressure and weight

comments: Issues with syncing BG monitor resolved and results are good, feedback is very good and helpful. Even though the app is connected to Google Fit or seems to be, nothing is being recorded in Fit. Can you please add Google Fit to the list of activity apps? I do not use a fitbit or smart watch at this time. Otherwise the app is top notch!
I've not used the diabetes education features. I'm happy that the app will capture the BG data while the bloody test strips is still in the meter. I just start the app immediately after testing.
Looks like a good app, bit it won't sync with my meter. I had minor problems with the original One Touch Reveal app, this is terrible.
This is a great app, but I wish that it would sync with the LOSEIT app like it does FITBIT and/or keep the food Input, it would save a lot of time. The coaching and information is GREAT.

(8/12/20 Update) Since the update to ver 1.5 build 132.1780, is way harder to enter data. Used to be able to do insulin and meds at same time, now you have to do one, go out, select other and then enter its value. Also, you can no longer enter insulin values higher than 99. If you take higher, you have to make 2 separate entries. The previous version was just starting to work well, now we're back to a screwed up app again. Will be dropping and moving to something else. Tired of this.

title: Diabetes & Diet Tracker
description:
MyNetDiary’s Diabetes & Diet Tracker app is the easiest and most comprehensive diabetes tracker app for Android.  MyNetDiary can help you better understand and control diabetes and pre-diabetes - along with improving your diet, losing weight and providing feedback, support and motivation.
 
MyNetDiary was featured in the Consumer Guide of Diabetes Forecast magazine, published by the American Diabetes Association, the world’s most trusted source of diabetes information. 

Designed for diabetes type 1, type 2, pre-diabetes and gestational diabetes.

This app helps you understand and control all aspects of diabetes. It shows you the “big picture” of your blood glucose factors by counting carbs in the food you eat, recording medication intake, exercise and everything else you want to capture about your condition.

The app coaches you on losing weight and staying fit. You will learn to eat better and become more active with app tips. The app reveals what really affects your blood glucose when you start changing your lifestyle. We hope your diabetes management story will be a success empowered by our tracker.

Our efficacy study based on self-reported MyNetDiary user data has shown that an active user loses 12% of body weight. Average A1C reduction is 1.4%.

MyNetDiary follows evidence-based guidelines and was ranked #1 diet app by an independent study published in the American Journal of Preventive Medicine. MyNetDiary was featured on NBC, NPR, Lifetime's The Balancing Act, USA Today, Wall Street Journal and Health Magazine.

▌ ESSENTIAL TOOLS FOR YOUR DIABETES & DIET MANAGEMENT
✓ Comprehensive blood glucose tracking with flexible pre-and post-meal target ranges. The app highlights out-of-range readings. Label your readings and understand root causes of BG excursions.
✓ Quick food logging takes only a few minutes a day. Meal reminders help you track consistently. Barcode scanner and instant food search make it fun.
✓ Optional insulin and medication tracking.
✓ Track lab results including A1C, cholesterol, blood pressure and heart rate.
✓ Diet planning for weight loss and maintenance. The app helps you set a realistic weight goal and lose weight in a steady, comfortable fashion.  It keeps analyzing your diary and provides personalized diet tips, it’s like having a virtual coach in your pocket.
✓ Carb counting and nutrition tracking uses a catalog of 805,000 verified foods, updated daily.
If a food is not in the catalog, send us its photos from the app and we will add the food for you, we call it “PhotoFood service”. 
✓ The app starts showing matching foods as you type food name or brand. Food Score helps you understand food labels at a glance.
✓ Net carbs or diabetes carb count for every meal and day
✓ Exercise tracking: log manually or link your diary with Fitbit*, Withings* and Garmin*.
✓ Track your water intake and all body measurements
✓ Custom trackers - track anything you want, such as quality of sleep, symptoms, and more.
✓ Detailed daily and weekly analysis, a comprehensive set of charts and reports helping you understand blood glucose, food, nutrition, weight loss, carb counting and diet management.
✓ Automatic sync to MyNetDiary.com for backup and access from all of your devices. 
✓ App screens are custom-tailored for tablets and phones.

* Advanced features require Premium subscription 

▌DISCLAIMER
This app is an educational tool, it is not a medical device, it is not a substitute for a medical device or medical care, and it does not provide diagnosis, cure, mitigation, treatment, or prevention of any disease. If you have questions or concerns about individual health matters or management of your conditions, please consult your healthcare team.
