title: Cafydia Diabetes
description:
In Cafydia Diabetes a new system is implemented to control diabetes. It is focused on self-management of diabetes mellitus type I or type II that use insulin pens in their treatments.


The application is relatively complex and therefore requires meanwhile some learning. It brings many features, but you don't must to use all, only those you need, depending on the needs of each person.


When using the charts activity and you have studied your glucose levels and has performed in Cafydia appropriate modifications to cover any and all contingencies with which you will see in your daily life, you will can eat whatever you want on the amount you want.


Things that help your body needs more or less insulin at a given meal:


* Meal hour: It is very important that the hours are approximately equal daily. Go far or near, a puncture affects everything that comes after too. In Cafydia an alarm system is implemented to indicate at all times if you are in the correct range or not.

* Amount of carbohydrates: In Cafydia is generated a linear function (We call Baseline) crossing carbohydrates and preprandial insulin doses so that this goes in proportion to the amount of carbohydrates. If one day you want to eat a little more or a little less, the dose will be adjusted accordingly.

* Glucose level before meal: In Cafydia automatically is calculated the correction factor for each patient. This will increase or decrease the dose to correct any deviation from the 100 mg/dL or 5.5mmol/L.

* Exercise hoping to make or has made recently around a meal: In Cafydia you can create items of Corrective type. Are modificators that can be turned on by hand or programmed by weekday to modify the initial dose provided by the Baseline. If you go walking makes you need two units less, create the Corrective turn it on and go for a walk quiet. If you always do on Wednesdays program it.

* Changes in routine times, like on vacation, etc: In Cafydia it implemented something called Metabolic Rhythms. By default you have one called Default, which acts to your routine. You can create all you need, for holidays, bridges, any time when you may need modifications of this style. In each of these you can specify how insulins will be modified with the passage of time. When Metabolic Rhythms overlap, a residue is generated for each Metabolic Rhythm modifier above. These residues act as day -1 and at them are assembled the next Metabolic Rhythm modifiers that is activated.

* Skin area in which insulin is administered: This is important. Repeat continuously the area where insulin is administered is a huge mistake. Doing so over time you will find days without knowing why will the sugar through the roof. Others have low blood sugar. It does not mean anything.


On this last point we are sorry, but Cafydia can not do anything about it.


The only motivation to have spent the last nine months developing the application is to help other diabetics like me who have the disease and live with it every day. I decided to publish it at no cost and without any annoying advertising just this.


And finally I would ask all diabetic who was encouraged to try it, you could contact me personally for all kinds of questions, ideas, suggestions, and so on.


Thanks and encouragement!


Miguel Collado
mcollado at cafydia dot org

title: Diabetes Info
description:
If you just found out you have diabetes, you probably have a lot of questions and you may feel a little uncertain. But you’re not alone. In the United States, 23.6 million people have diabetes. Most of these people lead full, healthy lives. One of the best things you can do for yourself is to learn all you can about diabetes.

Diabetes is a disease in which your blood glucose, or blood sugar, levels are too high. Glucose comes from the foods you eat. Insulin is a hormone that helps the glucose get into your cells to give them energy.

There are 2 types of diabetes. Type 1 diabetes occurs when your body’s pancreas doesn’t produce any insulin. Type 2 diabetes occurs when the pancreas either doesn’t produce enough insulin or your body’s cells ignore the insulin. Between 90% and 95% of people who are diagnosed with diabetes have type 2 diabetes.

This application discussed diabetes in details for your daily reading. It contains all you need to know about diabetes.

KEY FEATURES
*Overview  on diabetes
*Symptoms & Signs 
*Causes & Risk Factors 
*Types of Diabetes 
*Diagnosis & Tests 
*Treatment
*Complications
*11 Low-Sugar Drink Ideas 
*10 Muscle-Building Exercises and so on

The application is light in weight, it is almost 5MB so it will not use up much of your device memory capacity. Install it and enjoy for free. I have many other similar apps in the catalog, take a look and install them. You can always reach me through my email address Zaidjaz10@gmail.com for any suggestion or complaint.  

*****************CREDITS****************
All thanks to everyone at http://www.medicinenet.com/, https://familydoctor.org/ and https://www.healthline.com/ for the tremendous job they did in bringing the content of this app to web. All credits goes to them. Don't forget to take a look at their websites to learn more. Thank you.

title: BlueLoop
description:
BlueLoop® is the one and only tool that allows kids and their caregivers to log and share diabetes information - both online and with the app – real time, via instant e-mail and text message, giving peace of mind to parents, more class time for students, and fewer phone calls and paper logs for school nurses. Online, parents can share real-time BG logs with their clinicians, who can see logs (in the format THEY prefer), current dosages, and reports, all in one place.

Our insulin calculator provides accurate and consistent dosing information between multiple caregivers both at home and at school. This precise dosing and documentation will aid providers in insulin dose adjustments to improve clinical outcomes.

About the MyCareConnect Foundation:

We are a non-profit, run by parents of a child with type 1 diabetes.  Please don’t hesitate to contact us with any questions, suggestions, or concerns. We’re just a phone call or email away! (302) 4 Our Kids (302-468-7543) or support@mycareconnect.com.

Please first sign up for BlueLoop online at www.mycareconnect.com and use our free code BL55F. Once you’ve signed up online, you can then sign into the App with your login and password.

"We engage families and their children when they are first diagnosed, at the most  critical point in their journey with diabetes. And we equip them with the tools, peer support and education that is so important for families as they juggle coordinating care at home and at school" – Pam Henry, Founder and mom of  a child with Type 1 Diabetes.

comments: this app is great! my son has used it for a few months now. hes actually gone from not keeping track of his blood sugar to checking more often. this app quite working for a bit. i emailed them. in an hour they personally emailed me back and had it up and running 15 minutes after they contacted me! i don't know of anyone with this type of customer service!

I love this app!! As a supporter to 7 diabetics at school, this app is so easy to use and it's so helpful that the parents and doctor get the blood sugar #'s immediately as they test for them. I have not found anything I do not like and the Henry's are fabulous to work with via email or directly on the phone. I'd give a million stars if possible.
It's a wonderful tool to monitor and dose. It also helps children, parents, and doctors stay in tune with eachother.
Love this app! There are some things that are on the desktop version I wish were on the mobile app tho. But it's still a great app, love the sharing capability as well as the calculator.

We love Blue Loop! We use it everyday to keep track of our daughter's information. It helps us communicate with her school! We are also able to get useful data to help us make decisions when making insulin dosage changes! Great App!!!

title: Blood Sugar Log
description:
Blood sugar log is very useful for someone who often checks their blood sugar / glucose levels.  Blood sugar log app offers an easy way of logging your blood sugar readings in one place and analyse it through graphs and even print it as a pdf file.

Summary of features of the Blood sugar log :

1) Log or Add your blood sugar readings
2) Modify or delete your existing blood sugar reading or records
3) Shows History or all your logs for the past one year
4) Shows graph of your blood sugar fluctuations with filters
5) Generates pdf file of past one year data


Keywords:  Diabetes, Blood sugar tracker, Blood sugar log,  Glucose log, Glucose tracker, Blood sugar test, Diabetes management

comments: Very good app. I would give it 5 stars however it only lets you put your time in on the half hour or hour it would be nice if you could do it by actual minutes. I love that you can save the report in a pdf file.. made it very easy to tske report to my doctor.
This is fine. But our doctor's instruction for monitoring was for pre-meals so I prefer the apps with 'pre-breakfast', 'pre-lunch', and 'pre-dinner' categories.
I cannot make notes, ads cover the note section. I deleted the ad and a "ad deleted by Google banner covered the note section. If this doesn't stop I will chose another app.
Best yet and the fact you can print excellent easy to use thank you
It doesn't support mmol/L.

title: BolusEstimate
description:
This application is designed for insulin-dependant-diabetes people under functional insulin therapy. 

Just compose your meal by picking up foods with weight or percentage of serving size... and BolusEstimate will show the correct bolus/insulin to inject. Food can be searched by name or description or you can scan the barcode.
                 
Advices provided by BolusControl cannot replace doctors recommendations. 

This app cannot be held responsible in case of problem.

Glycemia should be tested capillary (fingers) and not via CGM systems (Freestyle Libre, Medtronic Guardian Connect etc...) .

title: GlukoCheck Diabetes Care
description:
GlukoCheck is a comprehensive, connected care diabetes platform that simplifies the way patients, caretakers and medical professionals manage diabetes. It combines diabetes monitoring device, mobile software and big data cloud computing infrastructure.

Our Android Mobile Application tool serves as a personalized diabetes management companion that collects clinical information & securely transmits it for cloud-based analysis.

Our glukocheck blood glucose device measures & seamlessly communicates blood glucose data to any Android mobile device. A clinical decision-support platform that uses advanced algorithms by generating personalized diabetes treatment recommendations for patients.

Personalized and smart insights, along with guidance from medical professionals, ensure effective treatment and reinforce healthy self-care behavior. It monitors glucose levels over time, to identify and understand trends.

Compact & sleek design Easy to carry
•	Compact design and fashionable appearance, so that blood sugar can be measured anytime and anywhere, keeps your body in good condition.
Large Memory Capacity
•	This device has a large Memory capacity that can save up to 180 tests with date and time.  
Less blood collector and painless
•	Less blood sample, reducing the psychological burden of blood collection, Ultrafine needle, quick rebound of blood collection.
Result takes 8 second Santi HCT interference
•	The unique design, results in 8 seconds, to minimize the disruption caused by external factors.
Bi-Directional Blood Sampling
•	Two sides blood sampling places, convenient for both hands operation. It is very suitable for busy people.
Auto Coding advanced nine electrode pin design
•	Auto coding with whole new generation of circuit design, electrochemical biosensor technology, better performance, more accurate result.

Device Specifications
•	Glucose test range: 20 - 600 mg/dL (1.1 - 33.3 mmol/L)
•	Results show: Equivalent to plasma
•	Test time: 8 seconds
•	Battery Type: 1 CR 2032 3.0V button battery
•	Battery Life: > 1000 Readings
•	Memory Storage: 180 test results with time & date
•	Meter Parameters: Time Date and Unit Settings
•	Result settings: Ac, Pc, and qC settings
•	Automatic shutdown: Automatic shutdown after 3 mins  
•	Working temperature: 10°- 40°C (50°- 104°F)
•	Operating Humidity: 20 - 80% (without condensation)
•	Hematocrit range: 25 - 65%
•	Physical size: 9.5cm x 6cm x 1cm
•	Box size: 17.5cm x 9.5cm x 4cm
•	Weight: 0.25kg

For More Information: 
Call: +91 8056222988,  
Visit: http://www.glukocheck.com

title: Glucose Hub
description:
Tracks blood glucose levels and everything that can affect them including insulin, diet and exercise. Also tracks blood pressure.

Intuitive diary function with search including search by location.

Data can be exported to and imported from your personal OneDrive account so you can keep your data if you change your phone.

Especially useful if you are using the DAFNE method to control your diabetes.

Features:
- Records blood glucose, insulin, diet, exercise and blood pressure
- Fast and simple data capture optimised for fast input and minimal touches with suggestive text based on previous entries
- Answer questions like "what insulin did I take last time I ate this and how did it affect my blood glucose?" and "What did I eat last time I was here?"
- Automatically records location data was logged. Diary entries can then be viewed on map and searched against current location
- Detailed diary view with search
- Graphical analysis of blood glucose, insulin and blood pressure including historical analysis
- Easy migration to new device and backup using OneDrive
- Supports both mmol/L and mg/dL units for blood glucose measurements
- Full personal control of your data (and no data harvesting).

100% Free with no ads.

title: How to Prevent Diabetes
description:
How to Prevent Diabetes Before It's Too Late, The food you eat gets broken down into a sugar, glucose. This sugar is sent out to your body's cells through your blood stream.

Diabetes occurs when you have above normal glucose levels. This causes problems in your cells when converting your food into energy. Your body's cells use insulin, a hormone made in your pancreas, to convert glucose into energy.

Learn here also How to Prevent Diabetes :

- how to prevent diabetes with family history
- how to prevent diabetes naturally
- food to prevent diabetes

Type 2 diabetes is considered to be an age related disease by many because it normally surfaces when you're older due to damage incurred throughout your life. This damage to your blood vessels and nerves is because of high glucose levels in your blood.

Type 2 is the most common form of Diabetes and was once called adult-onset diabetes. We now know that people can develop type 2 diabetes at any age.

Type 2 diabetes starts with insulin resistance. This is when your muscle, fat, and liver cells cannot use insulin properly to convert glucose into energy for proper cell function.

The pancreas produces more insulin initially to compensate. Eventually it will fail to produce enough insulin.

This is why preventing diabetes now is so important.

Those who are likely to develop diabetes should be familiar with the disease. If you're at risk of having it, learn how to prevent diabetes. You should know what symptoms to look for just in case, how can it be diagnosed, and what treatments are available. Your doctor can provide you with more information based on your individual health.

Download How to Prevent Diabetes now for learn more tips about health.

title: Diabetes Recorder
description:
Is an application to manage blood glucose levels every day. Was developed in order to reduce the burden of (SMBG) for blood glucose self-measurement. The recorded data can be output to so PDF, is available as sharing information with doctors and family to print. PDF is to work with other apps and services, storage services and save to PC, print out the copy machine is available in convenience stores and PC.

■ The main function
Recording function and blood glucose, HbA1c, body weight, body fat, pulse, blood pressure, insulin / GLP-1
Alarm function measurement
Creation and PDF, transfer function
Graph display function

■ cooperation print services that can be
We have tested the following services, in the app.

· Seven-Eleven Net Print
Circle K Sunkus network print
· BROTHER iPrint & Scan


■ other services cooperation
Cooperation has been confirmed in the following services.
· PDF to save DROPBOX
· PDF to save EVERNOTE
Save to Yahoo! box-PDF
Store and Google docs to PDF
Transfer and mail in GMail


■ target terminal
Android2.1 or more
Microsoft has confirmed that the terminal operates in the following.
e-mobile S31HT HTC ARIA (Android2.2)
docomo SO-02C SonyEricsson XPERIA Acro (Android2.3)
docomo N-04C NEC MEDIAS (Android2.3)
docomo SO-01B SonyEricsson XPERIA (Android2.1 update1)
docomo SC-04D Samsung GALAXY NEXUS (Android4.0)
docomo SH-03C SHARP LYNX 3D (Android2.2)

■ The difference between free version and paid version
Ads will be displayed on the screen.
The free version of the data retention period is three months.
In the paid version so that you can change as a response model, via the SD card, move to another terminal on the data, corresponding to the export and import to the SD card.
The free version as a transition to the paid version, only supports export of data.
The free version is fixing the past 30 days, in the paid version can be confirmed also specify the past month from that day to other graph display period of the function.

■ information such as the reference value has been used in the application
As of May 2012, we set the value based on the information of the Japan Diabetes Society.

title: Home Remedies For Diabetes
description:
Natural Home Remedies for Diabetes That Work Effectively

Diabetes or high blood sugar condition results due to the under performance of the hormone Insulin. Diabetes has created a global concern as more and more people are being affected due to their erratic life style and faulty eating habits. The old and the middle aged; irrespective of sex are the worst sufferers of this disease. Children also suffer from juvenile diabetes due to any congenital defect or obesity.

The hormone insulin is secreted from the Islets of Langerhans of the pancreas gland present in our body. Under-production of this hormone leads to incomplete metabolism of the carbohydrates, resulting in higher levels of sugar in blood. Excess sugar is also expelled through the urine exerting pressure on the kidneys. Type 1 and Type 2 are the two types of Diabetes mostly known, of which the latter is of common occurrence.

Symptoms

Diabetes can be diagnosed by the following symptoms

1. Excessive thirst followed by frequent urination
2. Excess hunger
3. Fatigue and weakness
4. Disturbances in sleep

Home Remedies for Diabetes

Diabetes in most of the cases cannot be cured but can be kept under control by making some modifications in the diet and lifestyle. Few tested home remedies can have a significant contribution in controlling this disease.

title: Stupid Simple Keto - Low Carb Diet Tracking App
description:
Lose weight and keep it off with Stupid Simple Keto, the easiest-to-use carb and macros counter for people on the ketogenic diet or for those looking to lose weight.

We now offer keto diet coaching by real certified nutrition coaches! Sign up right inside the app and get the accountability you need to keep you on track!

Why count carbs instead of calories?
Most people fail on low carbohydrate diets due to cheat meals that ruin their progress.  Stupid Simple Keto helps you avoid problematic carbohydrates so that you can finally succeed.  With the right foods, you can lose weight, feel great, and remain full all day long! The diet itself is similar to an Atkins diet, but based heavily on human biology.

FEATURES:

• Simple food icons for logging your daily carbs and calories.
• Track your progress over time and set daily goals.
• Tracks all of your food macros, fat, protein, as well as carbs.
• Take secure selfies and visually track your progress!
• The barcode scanner lets you add food in a snap.
• Sync between devices for free.
• Food bank conserves calories for special events.  
• Add custom foods.
• Helpful warnings when you approach your daily carb/fat/protein limit.
• Change portion sizes on the fly.
• Easily review your daily foods.    
• Helps you learn new habits, eat right, and ultimately keep the weight off.
• Track your daily water intake too!

Try it today, it's free! You have nothing to lose but the fat.

Sign up for Coaching and you'll get your very own certified diet coach to stick with you and help you succeed at your goals! Along with the all new coaching program we have a drastically improved food search database including hundreds of new restaurants!
comments: This app helps put some fun in your keto diet routine. It's also a handy way to keep track of macros and calories. Still not fun to diet, but Stupid Simple Keto Tracking certainly makes it less difficult. My only wish would be to have it sync with the Fitbit app.

Good app. The weight chart should show the historical date of the weight as well. The Quick Carbs, Protein or Fat icons should have blank space for reference so that the type of food to which those grams correspond can be written.
Extremely easy to use. Makes logging food fast. Very helpful in keeping up with your macro counts.
Easy to use. Helps me to keep track of my carb, fat, and protein intake.

Great app - love the scan feature. I do wish it was more intuitive for food entry and that you had the option to change something once you've entered it. I will often enter everything I plan to eat *before* I eat it to make sure I don't inadvertently exceed my allotments, but sometimes don't finish it all. If there is a way to do this I haven't found it, but it could be user error. 🤷‍♀️

title: Dnevnik samokontrole dijabetes
description:
Dnevnik samokontrole je aplikacija za vođenje evidencije GUK i ostalih podataka važnih za praćenje stanja dijabetesa i krvnog tlaka.
Dnevnik samokontrole je aplikacija koja se nalazi na vašem uređaju i uvijek je pri ruci, za razliku od standardne knjižice koja nije baš uvijek uz vas.

Dnevnik samokontrole ima nekoliko funkcija:
- upis podataka GUK
- upis podataka GUM
- upis količine inzulina
- upis količine Ugljikohidrata
- podsjetnik za obrok nakon unosa inzulina (ovo radi kao notifikacija za poruku i ostalo te ukoliko je urešaj stišan, notifikacija se neće oglasiti)
- upis podataka Ketona u krvi i mokraći
- upis podataka tjelesne težine
- evidencija HbA1c nalaza
- upis podataka krvnog tlaka
- praktičan pregled dnevnika u Web pregledniku na vašem računalu
- slanje istog pregleda putem e-mail opcije na uređaju
- sigurnosnu pohranu (backup) i vraćanje ukoliko mislite resetirati uređaj, ili mijenjate uređaj

Ukoliko nisi dijabetičar i imaš potrebu voditi samo evidenciju krvnog tlaka, samo u postavkama odaberi mogućnost vođenja evidencije tlaka.

title: GLOW. Ovulation & Period Tracker
description:
Get pregnant, log your period cycle and more. Discover all the ovulation, period, fertility and pregnancy information you need with Glow.

Log your period in the app’s calendar and track your cycle with our ovulation calculator. 

Your period tracker lets you record ovulation, PMS, and pregnancy symptoms. Or log your period and be in control of your fertility with our period tracker and ovulation calendar. 

Fertility made easy - 5 ways Glow can work for you:

1. Get pregnant easily - Log 40 different health signals from sexual activity, mood swings, PMS and more.
2. Period tracker and ovulation calendar! Get personalized period information with our cycle chart, ovulation tracker and period calculator.
3. Fertility FAQS - Want to learn more about charting your fertility, egg freezing and menstrual health? Our library of "Glow Scoops" has all the articles you need to stay informed.
4. PMS or other symptoms? Log them all on your period calendar and find out what they mean.
5. Ovulation and all things pregnancy - Join our community to share your views and learn from other experiences. PMS, periods and pregnancy tips - no topic is off limits! 

Take control with Glow’s dedicated resources. From a dedicated ovulation tracker, PDF ovulation reports or even a fertility calculator. Get quality information you need to get pregnant or track your cycle. 

Whether you use Glow as an ovulation tracker or period calculator you will get unparalleled support. Trying to get pregnant naturally or undergoing IVF or IUI? Join the largest online community for women who are trying to conceive. Or get your partner to join our mirror app because fertility is a team sport! 

Want a period tracker or a women’s health app you can rely on for detail and accuracy? We’ve got you covered. 

Download Glow today and take charge of your fertility.  

For full Privacy Policy and our Terms of Service:
https://glowing.com/privacy
https://glowing.com/tos

If you are having technical issues or have any questions about your cycle or period, we're here to help. Please send us an email to: support@glowing.com

comments: Hahahahhaa. This update deleted five years of period data. Before that, I hated opening it. Glow has been having an identity crisis for years. They can't just concentrate on a few things. They have to have ALL THE THINGS. Every update added more stuff I don't use and moved the one tool I do use: tracking my period. Ecstatic to delete this now that I'm not relying on its data.

Swore by this app for years. It was my go to! We have been struggling with infertility for a very long time and I kept years of logs in glow. When I actually needed them, all my information was gone. All my cycle data, no period predictions, no log of my positive ovulation tests, nothing. I thought it would be easy to contact customer service, but it's not. I got one email back from customer service, that's it. It's been 3 days. Dont trust glow with your important information.

[edited for update] I created a bug to fix the issues I had and communication was poor. Very disappointed. I used Glow for cycle tracking and it helped me avoid pregnancy for a year naturally and then conceive on the first cycle, I loved it! But now that my period is back almost 2 years later, all the features are clunky and I'm constantly bombarded with ads. Logging is more difficult and seems buggy, specifically the app doesn't recognize that I'm on my period.

Been using this app for 7 years , every prediction is spot on. I do have a suggestion however, you guys should add a hysterectomy log to this app. Some have questions about it and some have had one and want to log to keep up with cm and other things. As things are once a woman have a hysterectomy there is no use for this app anymore. Just a suggestion. Otherwise fantastic app.

The app served its purpose, but... I'm absolutely over receiving so many daily progress emails about things that just aren't possible due covid-19. Talking about prenatal classes and how wonderful they're going to be (no, they won't be, they're all cancelled), or about baby showers, or whom you'd like to have as a support system during birth (no one is allowed in at my hospital) is just like a punch to the gut... wish you'd have changed these messages given the current state of the world.

title: IF-Diabète
description:
C'est Une application dédiée aux personnes diabètiques sous insuline éduqués à l'insulinothérapie fonctionnnelle (IF), leur facilitant le calcul journalier de la dose de l'insuline rapide nécessaire pour le repas et aussi pour corriger leur glycémie de départ. Cette dose d'insuline calculée est adaptée aussi à l'activité physique prévue par le patient diabétique.
Le choix des repas par les patients est basé sur un livret diététique élaboré par l'équipe du Service d'Endocrinologie - Diabétologie, Centre Hospitalier Universitaire Mohammed VI- Oujda. Ce livret a été adapté à la culture culinaire du Maroc.
La saisie continue des données permet de générer automatiquement un carnet de surveillance glycémique électronique, ce dernier peut être transmis au personnel médical pour éventuel ajustement du traitement en ligne. 
Cette application est élaborée dans le cadre d'une collaboration entre le Laboratoire des Systèmes Electroniques Informatiques et Images (LSE2I) et le Service d'Endocrinologie - Diabétologie, Centre Hospitalier Universitaire Mohammed VI- Oujda.

title: Low Glycemic Diet Plan
description:
What is the Glycemic Index?

The glycemic index (or GI) is a ranking of carbohydrates on a scale from 0 to 100 according to the extent to which they raise blood sugar (glucose) levels after eating. Foods with a high GI are those which are rapidly digested, absorbed and metabolised and result in marked fluctuations in blood sugar (glucose) levels. Low GI carbohydrates – the ones that produce smaller fluctuations in your blood glucose and insulin levels – is one of the secrets to long-term health, reducing your risk of type 2 diabetes and heart disease. It is also one of the keys to maintaining weight loss. Here is the evidence.

For diabetes: All of the evidence based recommendations for the management of diabetes from the major diabetes organisations around the world (the American Diabetes Association; Canadian Diabetes Association and Diabetes UK for example) now advise people with type 1 and type 2 diabetes to use the GI or GL as part of the nutritional management of their condition. 

For gestational diabetes: In their recently released guidelines, Initiative on gestational diabetes mellitus: A pragmatic guide for diagnosis, management, and care, the International Federation of Gynecology and Obstetrics have recently recommended a focus on lower GI foods. “Low GI diets are associated with less frequent insulin use and lower birth weight than in control diets, suggesting that it is the most appropriate dietary intervention to be prescribed to patients with GDM,” they say.

For cholesterol: An analysis of 28 randomised controlled trials provided high-level evidence that high-fibre, low GI diets can significantly reduce total and LDL cholesterol levels, independent of weight loss. 

For weight maintenance: The Diogenes study from Europe found that a moderately high protein, low GI diet is the best for longer-term weight management. ﻿

More Feature;
# A beginner guide
# Factors the affect the GI of a food
# The Amount of carbs is also important
# Low-GI diet and diabetes
# Others benefits
# Foods to eat
# Foods to avoid
# Sample Meal Plan Low-Glycemic (7day)
# Healthy Low-GI Snacks
# Drawbacks of the Low-GI diet
# BMI Calculator
# Notes
# Goal tracker
# Calorie Calculator
# Apps Info

title: myChildren's
description:
The MyChildren’s app from Nationwide Children’s Hospital allows you to keep track of all your children’s healthcare needs. Specialty tools for kids who have diabetes, Epilepsy or are in a NICU facility. Made for any child, anywhere.
Key Features Include:
-	The app easily creates a timeline for all immunizations your child needs
-	A growth chart for each child
-	An area for your docs and services you use
-	Provides age-appropriate wellness tips for each child 

Urgent Care Wait times
 - If you live in Central Ohio you can also get quick access to Nationwide Children’s facilities and live wait times!

 Medication tracking tool
-Search, add, and track medications for each child
-Get notified when it is time to refill your medication
-Set alarms and receive notifications when it is time to take your meds
 - Easy access medication reference materials

Diabetes Toolkit
-View enhanced insulin calculations to better manage your child's diabetes. If insulin adjustment is needed, the calculator will determine which insulin to adjust and change insulin dose
-Track your entries by time of day, week, month or year
-Separate journal entries by meal type
-Setup reminders to help you remember to make your journal entry

Epilepsy Toolkit
-Log your child’s seizures easily with the new Seizure Log
-Fill out your child’s Seizure Action Plan, which is their EMERGENCY medicine dosage and it can be easily shared with friends, school nurse or any of your child’s caretakers
-Set reminders for each medication to let you know when to take and refill your meds
-Use the new checklist feature as a quick reference guide to help you with your next physician appointment
-Browse a robust amount of useful and educational Epilepsy content

comments: Loved it , used this too chart my sons feedings ie how much he drank, the time. And track when he would sleep and for how long, his weight, lenght ,etc , and when he got his meds as I did this during his NICU stay from thanksiving '19 -12/23/19 , I stayed everyday & Night w him i didnt really need to chart all that really but felt better doing it for my own good, awesome app and id recommend it too other mommys!

MyChart by Epic is superior. You'll have access to your children's upcoming appointments, shot records and you can even schedule doctor visits. This myChidrens app is a little scammy because you have to put in your child's information and it doesn't provide access to your appointments.
Does not accept same log in as online account or link children already on account.
it currently has been given me issues...not opening, not allowing me to sign in, freezing.
This App is ridiculously hard to get into if you've forgotten or lost your log in info. I don't know one human on earth that would want access to MY child's health info EXCEPT for me.

title: Carbs & Cals - Diabetes & Diet
description:
The revolutionary Carbs & Cals App contains over 3,500 food & drink photos with the carbohydrate, calorie, protein, fat & fibre values clearly displayed above each photo.

FOR TECHNICAL SUPPORT, QUESTIONS AND SUGGESTIONS: Please email info@carbsandcals.com and we'll be happy to help!

★ FOOD & DRINK DATABASE:  The App is currently available for the UK (3,500+ food & drink photos), USA (2,000+ photos) and Portugal (900+ photos), with the database being expanded all the time.

★ PORTION SIZES: Up to 6 portion photos for each item (perfect for portion control & weight loss!)

★ BRANDED FOODS:  Customer favourites, such as Kellogg’s, Domino’s, Danone, Weetabix, Ryvita, Yakult, Dorset Cereals, Innocent, Alpen, Nakd, Ready Brek… and many more coming soon!

★ FOOD & DRINK CATEGORIES:  22 different categories covering Biscuits & Crackers, Branded Foods, Bread, Breakfast, Cakes & Bakery, Desserts, Drinks, Eggs & Cheese, Fruit,  Ingredients (for cooking & baking), Meals, Meal Accompaniments, Meat, Chicken & Fish, Nuts & Seeds, Potatoes, Rice, Pasta & Grains, Sauces & Spreads, Seasonal, Snacks, Take-aways, Vegetables & Pulses and Yoghurt.

★ MY FOODS:  Take photos of your own food and add them to a customised list in the App!

★ MEAL CALCULATOR:  No need for scales or complicated calculations! Just look at the food on your plate, find the food in the App, choose the relevant portion size & add it to the Meal Calculator.

★ INTEGRATED CALENDAR: Store a breakfast, lunch, dinner & 3 snacks per day in the Calendar to keep track of the food & drink you consume each day. 

★DAILY TARGETS:  Calculates your estimated calorie & nutrient intake and gives you daily targets for carbs, cals, protein, fat & 5-a-day. 

★ RECIPE BUILDER: Add components of a recipe & the App will automatically calculate the nutritional information per serving.

★ EXERCISE: Calculates calories burned in a wide range of different exercise and keeps track of your activity in the Diary.

★ DOWNLOAD ALL IMAGES FACILITY: For using the App when no Internet access is available (e.g. in restaurants, on holiday, and when out & about.)

★ DIABETES AREA: Log your blood glucose readings and link the carbohydrate content of meals to the insulin calculator.

★ Compiled by Chris Cheyette MSc BSc (Hons) RD, Diabetes Specialist Dietitian & Yello Balolia BA (Hons), Photographic Artist.

PLEASE NOTE: The App is available for Android phones with OS 2.1 & up, with autofocus camera.

HAVE A SUGGESTION OR QUESTION? Email info@carbsandcals.com and we'll do our best to help you or improve the App and release a free update. PLEASE USE OUR EMAIL AS WE’RE NOT ABLE TO RESPOND TO MARKET REVIEWS.

comments: Android Phone? - Don't Bother! Being taught to use this app in the hospital to manage my newly diagnostic child, I was horrified to find that once discharged from the hospital and left to "go solo", everything that I had learnt was void as the app you rely so heavily on, doesn't actually work on android. Extremely disappointed that I paid my money in good faith for this app, only to discover that it does not have half the foods and you cannot change your weights to get exact carbohydrates.

Last update was 2018, no replies to emails! This is very lazy and evidences a lack in development. Many common foods are missing or it is fussy regarding food names. This could easily be resolved with more variables and again evidences lazy development. It's also slow to use and states "downloading" every time launched. The included basal bolus system is useless, you have to manually calculate carbs and there isn't anywhere to input a correction ratio, or reduction ratios for exercise etc.

Good idea but outdated. Given the current technology this app could be improved further. For example, link with online database, such as calories king and so on. Healthcare workers encouraged me to use the app, but I don't find myself beneficial from it because the database is limited.

I saw thought that this app would be Perfect for helping me to control my type 1 diabetes but it just does not contain enough info on uk foods. I therefore, cannot give a higher rating. Check out weights of anything on toast 737g not! When will you update and rectify. This is , after all, a paid for app.

Brilliant app was recommended to get it by doctor at the hospital as I'm diabetic to help me count carbs on what I eat and it's great, it also tells you the fat content, calories and protein for different portion sizes on quite a range of different foods and takeaways. Would definitely recommend

title: Diabetes
description:
Diabetes is a metabolic disorder where the human body does not produce adequate quantities, or utilise, the hormone insulin required for the absorption of glucose. Diabetes mellitus is now  a common disease and its prevalence is increasing steadily.

This animation describes glucose metabolism and deals with the causes, symptoms, complications and treatments of diabetes.

comments: I love this little game. Its fun, fast paced as you want it to be, just challenging enough to be enjoyable. The graphics are super cute. I would definitely recommend to a friend! Super fun! Played 50 rounds the first day. Sound effects a cross between Goofy and The Rock. Good for what ails you if you are (like me) about to barf from all the politics stuff!! Try it; YOU WILL LIKE IT!!

I really enjoy this game. It has zero annoying ads. You do have an ad opportunity, but you gain something from watching it and it's not forced on you. Now that's how ads should be. The game is a good diversion without becoming frustrating. Update 10/23/20 - All morning, I've been getting "You must connect to server" messages. I'm already connected. If I go to the chat and back, it connects. This is a nuisance. I often can't gain credit for the tournament points I've earned.

I have been playing this game for well over a year now. Almost to level 1500. I have NEVER spent one cent. Yes some levels are harder and it takes multiple times to beat it. But they are all beatable. It doesnt have constant ads or pressures to buy extra stuff. If you want it to be easy and spend your money by all means go ahead. Or just be patient and its free to all. Great job guys!! 5 stars!!

I've enjoyed the game so far. I like that there are easier levels and more challenging ones. I also love the unlimited life time that gets handed out, but I do have a suggestion. Why not make that bankable like coins and the boosters? I can't always play for an hour or more, but I don't want the unlimited lives to go to waste just because it's not a good time to play. It would be great to be able to select an increment of time for unlimited lives from your bank. Otherwise, great game.

LOVE THE GAME! However, after the latest update the app becomes soooo laggy. From splash screen to the home screen takes almost 10 minutes. Sometimes when you move to the next level it takes almost 3 minutes to play again. I hope the devs will fix it asap. This is the only game app that love so much.

title: Diabetes Words
description:
Diabetes Words is an application for patients suffering from type 2 diabetes and for their relatives. It is an easy-to-use tool designed to help individuals understand everything they need in their daily life. The users will be able to read all the information they need about type 2 diabetes.
Type 2 diabetes is the most common type of diabetes. It is a chronic disease generally characterized by insulin resistance, which leads to high blood glucose levels. Hygiene and dietary habits need to be adapted and medication can be used.

title: Life in Control Diabetes Coach
description:
Diabetes can attack your health from all directions. Meet the one app carefully designed to provide personalised yet comprehensive Diabetes Management at your fingertips!

Here is a list of features available in Life in Control:

1) Your Personal Diabetes Coach:
Your coaches assess your health and create a diet and exercise plan that adapts with your health condition.  They are also constantly available to answer questions and give advice and support.

2) Daily Tasks and Health Goals:

We create long-term health goals for managing Diabetes. We then hand-hold you towards these goals by giving small and manageable daily tasks every day with gentle reminders!

3) Diabetes Lifestyle Management:

Find diabetic friendly diet and exercises, count calories burned and consumed, and get an estimated impact of each meal on your blood sugar level.

4) Log and Visualise Health Data:

Monitor Diabetes and track HbA1C and Blood Sugar Levels, medicines, insulin and other health vitals. Get a complete picture of your health using our beautiful visualisations.

Variation in Blood Glucose Level: An overall as well as category-wise view of your blood sugar levels on your preferred time scale. 

For the health nerds, we've also included percentile-based graph for your blood glucose ranges. 

Timeline: Understand how your food, activity and medicine impact your blood sugar level with an interactive Timeline! 

5) Alerts, Warnings, and Reminders:

Our dynamic system warns of your any possible health risks including hypoglycemia, hyperglycemia, and other complications. You can also set reminders for taking insulin and other medicines!

6) Remain Connected to your Doctor:

If your doctor is a part of the Life in Control network, he can see your health data, monitor your progress and adapt your treatment plan (including insulin and other medicines) using our web application.

title: Diabetes preventive measure and cares
description:
Diabetes is a chronic disease that occurs either when the pancreas does not produce enough insulin or when the body cannot effectively use the insulin it produces. Insulin is a hormone that regulates blood sugar. Hyperglycaemia, or raised blood sugar, is a common effect of uncontrolled diabetes and over time leads to serious damage to many of the body's systems, especially the nerves and blood vessels.

Health impact

Over time, diabetes can damage the heart, blood vessels, eyes, kidneys, and nerves.

Adults with diabetes have a two- to three-fold increased risk of heart attacks and strokes(1).

Combined with reduced blood flow, neuropathy (nerve damage) in the feet increases the chance of foot ulcers, infection and eventual need for limb amputation.

Diabetic retinopathy is an important cause of blindness, and occurs as a result of long-term accumulated damage to the small blood vessels in the retina. Diabetes is the cause of 2.6% of global blindness(2).

Diabetes is among the leading causes of kidney failure(3).

Simple lifestyle measures have been shown to be effective in preventing or delaying the onset of type 2 diabetes. To help prevent type 2 diabetes and its complications, people should:

achieve and maintain a healthy body weight;

be physically active – doing at least 30 minutes of regular, moderate-intensity activity on most days. More activity is required for weight control;

eat a healthy diet, avoiding sugar and saturated fats; and

avoid tobacco use – smoking

title: Blood Sugar Tracker: Glucose Diary Average Records
description:
Blood Sugar Tracker: Glucose Diary Average Records is the health utility application for those user that might have been suffering from Diabetes. We have big plans for this app and look forward to making it as useful as possible to those trying to control their diabetes. Control your blood sugar level with multiple build-in features like measurements analysis, statistics, graphs, comprehensive reports. Add tags to each record – so with the help of diabetes logs you will find out your diabetes dynamics, for example, before meals, before breakfast, after lunch, after meals, In Morning, evening etc. With multi-profile support, track blood glucose level of other members of your family too. 

The application is designed to keep the complete track record of the user’s Blood sugar level. Since this data is very sensitive, we offer you a high level of data protection. Therefore, your health data is stored only where it belongs. Track your blood sugar and pulse history and save your blood glucose and pulse into a log to analyze and compare the entries. User can enter the blood sugar in application, the application will indicate that whether user’s Blood sugar level is normal, high or low. The user can maintain the record of Blood sugar and later can view the history in multiple forms as the user can view the records in statistical form. 

You can view statistics of Blood sugar / glucose level (minimum, average, and maximum), Blood pressure (minimum, average, and maximum) and Insulin daily dosage taken. Best app for recording blood glucose level.  Blood Sugar Information as the right tool to determine the blood glucose rating. The application has multiple options where user can set custom options for his/her convenience. The user can share these records with his/her doctor, user can export the records and create reports in various forms. Enter your blood sugar levels values first and press on calculate. The app shows different colors to let you know how good your blood sugar is. Measure Systolic and Diastolic BP, monitor Heart Rate Pulse.

title: Diabetic Diet Plan Chart
description:
Diabetic Diet Plan - Manage Diabetes with Diet, If some is suffering from diabetes, it means that his body cannot produce insulin in normal fashion. As a result, it increases the glucose level in the blood. Switching to healthy diabetic diet plan can be of help at this time. Planning for an appropriate diet is a crucial part of your treatment journey, because it can manage the level of glucose in your blood.

List Topics will discuss:

diabetic diet chart
diabetes food list	
diabetic diet recipes

Features of the app:

Can Use For Offline App
Updated regularly
You can ask questions from our experts
Simple app book Knowledge like pocket on your phone
You can also send us your suggestions and we will add them inside the app For more updates.

Learn Here about Diabetic Diet Plan:

Sensible selections of food along with healthy and disciplined lifestyle are the two key success points of diabetic treatment. A healthy diabetic diet plan must include six essential factors such as restricting consumption for sweet products, frequent eating, attentive towards carbohydrate consumption, consume plenty amount of whole grain foods, fruits and vegetables, eating low-fat products, restriction in alcohol consumption.

Diabetic Diet

If you are having diabetes, it doesn't mean that you should start eating special foods or depend on only strict diabetic diet plan. In most of the case, it is simply switching to a variety of foods in moderate amounts but following a fixed timing.

You should not follow a complicated diabetic diet plan, rather your diet should comprise with a wise selection of nutrients and low in calorie and fatty contents. There are two essential factors that you must not forget while preparing your diet plan. One is eating foods at regular time every day and the second point is the selection of healthy food in right amounts.

Carbohydrate counting is a crucial part for healthy diet plan, especially if you are on insulin medication. In fact, fat and protein counting is not as important as carbohydrate counting is. But that doesn't mean you should not be careful enough about the fat or protein intake. High calorie and high fat always increase the risk of various health complications including cardiac problems, high cholesterol and high blood pressure.

Diabetic Diet and Sweets Consumption

The fact says if you are suffering from diabetes, all your near and dear ones continuously warn you not to have sweets in your diet. Contrary to popular belief, scientific studies confirmed that sweets may not produce any harm if it can be used in a balanced amount in the meal plan. Although, different sweets affect blood sugar level in a varied fashion, but the total carbohydrate count matters the most. If you consider a small amount of sweets in your overall diabetic diet plan, it will not harm your health.

Download Diabetic Diet Plan now for more information.

title: Diabetic eDiary
description:
Designed to improve the life of Type 1 diabetics who are insulin dependent and inject up to 4 times over the course of a day.
If you are lucky enough to be using an insulin pump, then stop reading now as this is application really isn't designed for you.

Diabetic eDiary will let you record, monitor and display blood glucose and insulin levels, and to replace the traditional hand-written Diary method used by diabetics, usually given to them by their clinic/consultant.

This application can be used by insulin dependent (Type 1) diabetics who are on either mmol/L or the mg/dl (UK) scale as it is not unit specific.

Main functionality includes, Blood Glucose entry 4 times daily (user reminders) and 4 insulin injections daily (user reminders), food entry (in Carbohydrate grams value) as well as any exercise logged during the day.

I myself am a Type 1 insulin dependent diabetic, diagnosed only 3 years ago. I'm also a Software Engineer, After about 6 months of using the paper based Diabetic eDiary given to me by the hospital, I decided I could do something much better. Like most people nowadays, I carry my mobile/cell phone with me everywhere, and I got pretty fed up carrying the diary and a pen every day!

The Diary component, (arguably the most important part) closely represents the traditional hand-written diary and can be transferred to your PC or emailed to your diabetic consultant with a couple of touches. Also within the diary you can add notes against readings if you want and a useful feature I added is that readings will flash heart icons if you have undertaken any exercise (walking/sport) within the previous 4 hours. 

The eDiary also allows you to record main meals (it terms of carbohydrates), and importantly, allows easy and quick recording of exercise/walking events.

Although my primary goal was to have something that replaced the paper based Diabetic eDiary, for me to keep using it over the longer term it needed to be fast, slick, simple to use and not something that would take over my life. 

I also wanted some nice graphing/pie chart displays as well as having the ability to back up my data, move it to another phone if need be, or even email my Diabetic nurse/consultant with the Diabetic eDiary (or my full results) when I visited the clinic.

I've been used this app for about two years now, accumulating a lot of data and adding functionality and fixing bugs as I've gone along. The amount of time required to input a blood glucose measurement, related insulin injection and food value is minimal. This has been a primary reason why I have kept using it regularly and missed very few entries in my eDiary over the entire two year period.

To still be using this application after more than 2 years is a real success for me, as it's always very easy to become complacent and stop recording measurements when it takes too much time or effort.

To still be using this application after more than 2 years is a real success for me, as it's always very easy to become complacent and stop recording measurements when it takes too much time or effort.
summary: Diabetic eDiary - replace and improves on the Type 1 standard hand written diary

title: Blood Sugar Checker / Blood Glucose Tracker
description:
This is the health utility application for those user that might have been suffering from diabetes.


The application is designed to keep the complete track record of the user’s Blood Sugar. User can enter the Blood Glucose reading in application, the application will indicate that whether your Blood Glucose is normal, high or low. Best app for recording Blood Sugar readings MG/DL, MMOL/L & pulse rate. 


The user can share these records with his/her doctor, user can export the records and create reports in various forms. Enter your Blood Sugar values first and press on save. The glucose diary will allow you to track your regular hemoglobin, sugar (glucose) levels, pressure, insulin, and also add tags, medications, condition, and weight to each record.

title: Talking Tom Hero Dash - Run Game
description:
One of the most fun endless runner games! Players join Talking Tom and his heroic friends on a mission to run, get gold and rebuild the world! Playing this new action game will make anyone a true superhero!

★ ANYONE CAN BE A SUPERHERO: Talking Tom, Talking Angela and their super friends all have amazing unique superpowers that they can use while running! Players can also try using their high-tech superhero gadgets!

★ DEFEATING RACCOON GANGS: Besides collecting gold coins and avoiding obstacles, hitting raccoons will earn players some extra rewards!

★ RACCOON BOSS FIGHTS: Players can unlock Talking Angela, Talking Hank, Talking Ben, and Talking Ginger by saving them in action-packed Raccoon Boss fights!

★ RUNNING THROUGH AWESOME WORLDS: Players will fight the raccoons among skyscrapers, alongside tropical surf beaches, through Chinese-inspired villages, and in mysterious desert temples.

★ EXCITING STUNTS: In this fun game, each running world is a unique adventure. Players can dash and leap between rooftops, swing on cranes, and run along cruise ships, but they need to watch out for swimming pools!

★ RESCUING AND REBUILDING: Raccoons are destroying and polluting the world and it’s up to players to drive them away so that you can clean up and rebuild. Once each location is fixed up, it’s time to face the Raccoon Boss. After players defeat him, it’s on to the next running world! What’s it going to be? A surf beach? Or maybe a temple?

★ UNLOCKING SUPERHERO OUTFITS: Players can unlock heroic runner outfits piece by piece and customize each superhero. Dashing!

★ SPECIAL EVENTS: Explore new ways of playing, and complete missions to earn awesome rewards.

Players who love Talking Tom Gold Run and other running or superhero games are going to want Talking Tom Hero Dash in their collection too!

PLAY FOR FREE!

This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and advertising;
- Links that direct customers to Outfit7’s websites and other apps;
- Personalization of content to encourage users to play the app again;
- YouTube integration to allow users to watch videos of Outfit7's animated characters;
- The option to make in-app purchases;
- Items to purchase (available in different prices) using virtual currency, depending on the player’s progress; and
- Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchases using real money.

Terms of use: http://outfit7.com/eula/
EEA privacy policy: https://outfit7.com/privacy/eea/
US privacy policy: https://outfit7.com/privacy/
Rest of the world privacy policy: https://outfit7.com/privacy/
Customer support: support@outfit7.com

title: DIABETES TREATMENT App
description:
IMPORTANT:
*Users who have APKs with previous version, may need to receive android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE permission*

_________________


This app contains about Diabetes Treatment. Learn everything and you will find tips and knowledge for treating diabetes and knowing the causes, symptoms, etc.

Diabetes is a disease that is the result of your body not producing enough insulin. Insulin is a hormone produced by your body that helps to turn sugars into energy. The symptoms of diabetes are increased thirst, increased urination, constant hunger, weight loss, irritability, blurred vision, and fatigue. While each symptom alone is harmless, the combination of symptoms could mean that you have diabetes. And, if left untreated, diabetes can become a serious illness and can put you at a higher risk for other, more serious illnesses, such as heart disease and stroke.


In this app, we will disscuss the following topics:

• Understanding Diabetes - Diagnosis and Treatment
• Diabetes Treatment For Types I and II
• Diabetes Treatment and Guidelines
• Diabetes Treatment - Which Treatments are Effective
• An Overview of Diabetes Types and Treatments
• Everything You Need to Know About Diabetes
• What Are Symptoms Of Type 2 Diabetes in Children?
• How Does High Blood Sugar (Hyperglycemia) Feel?
• Herbal and Natural Remedies for Diabetes
• 10 Tips On How To Reverse Diabetes Naturally


And much more..


[ Features ]

- Easy & simple guide book app
- Periodic update of contents
- Support Offline Database 
- Shareable contents
- You can ask questions from our experts
- Send us your suggestions and we will add it


A little words about Diabetes Treatment:

Times were when being diagnosed as having diabetes was the end of the world though today, however with great advances in technology and medical science there's less reason to be worried as there are a variety of different diabetes treatments to look after the issue including taking medicines while it's also feasible to do without them. However, after you are diagnosed as having diabetes you must straight away talk to a physician who will then prescribe the best diabetes treatment for your personal case.

Though it is feasible to take diabetes treatment without turning to medicines and injections, the final straw would be the sort of diabetes that affects you and its causes as well as your present state of being. Among the other diabetes treatments that you need to think about using is performing lots of exercise while chalking out a correct diet has additionally proved to be extraordinarily effective.

Since you form certain habits that are a consequence of your diet and exercise program, this is one superb way of improving your diabetes problem as it helps to reduce the chance of complications while also brings blood sugar levels to controllable levels. And, if that is not enough, this sort of diabetes treatment can also help in preventing the illness under certain circumstances.

Diabetes treatment and knowing how to treat diabetes effectively will allow you to achieve optimum health. Understanding what the best treatments available for type 1 diabetes as well as type 2 diabetes is essential. The most important point to remember for all types of diabetes is to implement a healthy diet plan as well as regular exercise.


Download Diabetes Treatment now to read more..

comments: I really enjoy playing this game but I wish that it went up in levels instead of just continuing 1 game and u constantly repeating it or trying to get a higher score. Plus a good idea would be to have like maybe 2 games going at once and it just keep getting harder but it is very fun cuz I have sat here and played it n I don't get bored with it yet and I've been playin about a good hour now.

Great design. No freezing or app closing in the middle of a game...However, app stops giving you dollars and gives you cents instead. UNTIL...you get to the last .20 cents of the game. It then gives you nothing so you can not reach the pay out goal. If i could give zero stars, i would. What a rip off and waste of time. And to think I shared this game with friends and family as one of best payout games on the market.

Love the game!❤❤ I play it for hours and don't get bored with it at all! The only time I do actually stop is when my battery is dead (I hate when that happens) and when that does happen thankfully my progress saves for the next time I want to play. It's the best game ever, the only thing that would make it better is that if it had some levels or daily challenges at least, but still the BEST GAME EVER!!! Keep up the great work!😁

I wish this was more enjoyable. WHERE ARE THE SETTINGS? Can I turn off volume? Turn off vibrate, etc. Ads after EVERYTHING. Pausing, getting a combo, starting new, sometimes 2 ads after resuming from a pause. Ugh! I understand ads, but this is too much. To be honest I may be more apt to pay for Ad free if I could access settings to actually play without having to adjust the volume on my phone.

The game itself is a lot of fun. The ads make it basically unplayable. The game makers need to make an income, sure. But I've played plenty of f2p stuff that pulls off ads without being so pervasive. For context, I was getting an ad every 2-3 numbers dropped.
